reviews.comments: Mình hơi đắn đo khi book chỗ ở qua 1 host chưa quen biết nhưng thật không ngờ chị Chi tuyệt vời hơn mình nghĩ. Chị phản hồi rất nhanh, thân thiện, chỉ dẫn rất nhiệt tình. Mình có việc nên phải lưu trú thêm 1 tiếng tới 12h mới checkout trong khi đúng hạn phải là 11h trưa. Tuy nhiên, chị Chi vẫn thu xếp để mình được ở thêm đến 12h mà không thu thêm phí. Nhất định đợt tới sẽ ở đây tiếp. Mọi thứ quá tuyệt vời với cá nhân mình.

Bạn chủ nhà rất thân thiện, trả lời phản hồi nhanh chóng, chu đáo gợi ý những điểm du lịch hay nhà hàng cho mình luôn. Căn hộ rất sạch sẽ, dễ chịu. Vị trí nằm đối diện bãi tắm biển rất tiện cho du khách. Mình chắc chắn sẽ quay lại vào lần tới ❤️
Phòng rộng rãi , sạch sẽ đầy đủ tiện nghi , chị chủ nhà thân thiện , anh quản gia vui tính , nói chung là 10đ

Tôi có chuyến công tác kết hợp thăm Vịnh Hạ Long, thuê được căn hộ của chị Chi rất là ưng ý, chủ nhà thân thiệt, nhiệt tình hướng dẫn chu đáo,  chỗ ở thuận tiện, không gian tuyệt vời, phòng sang trọng. Gần khu Cái Dăm nhiều nhà hàng ăn uống ngon, tiện lợi, giá cả phù hợp. Nhất định sẽ quay lại nếu có dịp!

Easily the best Airbnb I’ve stayed at. Luxury condo with huge bedroom space, living space, kitchen, and bathroom. Everything was gorgeous was so clean. Chi was so friendly and responded immediately, she was so kind from the very start of the trip. Her effort is evident through the space as well as her customer service. Can’t recommend enough!
mọi thứ đều rất tuyệt. chị chủ hỗ trợ nhiệt tình. nhất định sẽ quay lại trong tương lai

Chi'a place at A La Carte is exactly as advertised. It's a beautiful unit and building. There is a beach just outside the lobby with amenities available.
If you're looking for a place to rejuvenate and relax outside the downtown area this one is highly recommended. Cabs are cheap or you can rent a car/scooter and park underground .
Would highly recommend

Đã đi du lịch nhiều nơi, đặt phòng trên nhiều nền tảng khác nhau nhưng có thể khẳng định rằng trải nghiệm lần này tại phòng thuê của host Chi là cực kì ấn tượng.
Ấn tượng đầu tiên là tính hiếu khách của chủ nhà. Ms Chi rất thân thiện, luôn sẵn sàng giải đáp các thắc mắc cũng như hỗ trợ tôi khi có vấn đề này sinh hoặc yêu cầu sử dụng dịch vụ lân cận.
Ấn tượng tiếp theo là phòng ốc. Tất cả các tiện nghi đều giống như mô tả, sạch sẽ, đầy đủ. Chỉ vài bước chân từ phòng là ra đến biển, vô cùng tiện lợi.
Và cuối cùng là giá phòng cũng như giá các dịch vụ lân cận đi kèm là rất hợp lí.
Một chuyến đi quá hoàn hảo! Nhất định tôi sẽ trở lại và giới thiệu cho bạn bè của tôi khi có kế hoạch đến với Hạ Long!
quả thật đây là lần đầu tiên tôi
quar thaatj thật sự tôi có ấn tượng mạnh mẽ với dịch vụ phòng lần này trên AirBnB
Chủ nhà rất thân thiện, chủ động liên hệ từ sớm vào ngày check in. Quản gia chờ sẵn và hướng dẫn rất chi tiết cụ thể. Phòng sạch sẽ, yên tĩnh. Xứng đáng với giá tiền.

Nơi ở thuận lợi, dễ tìm, nhà sạch đẹp. Chị chủ nhà rất thân thiện và phản hồi tin nhắn nhanh chóng. Chị quê ở đây nên hiểu biết về chỗ ăn, chơi nên hướng dẫn rất chuẩn! 10₫! Nếu có dịp tôi sẽ quay lại!

The apartment is amazing! Beautiful, very clean, and spacious, with a stunning view of the lake and the city. Everything was well-prepared and organized. Chi was very friendly, responded quickly, and provided accurate information. I am extremely satisfied with my experience here and would definitely recommend it to others looking for an ideal place to stay!
Let me know if you’d like any adjustments!

Couldn’t recommend this place enough ! It was so spacious with a great view out the window and balcony and had a super comfy bed and sofa. The room was spotless honestly one of the cleanest I’ve stayed in and Chi the host was super accommodating answering any questions we had instantly and even allowing us to check out slightly later! Would defo stay here again :)

Chi was an amazing hosts and was extremely responsive with all our needs. The unit is very luxurious! Provides an amazing bath tub and views. The infinity pool in this building is astonishing! Highly recommend.
Địa điểm quá đẹp, trung tâm. Chủ nhà rất thân thiện, nhiệt tình, tư vấn và giới thiệu dịch vụ xung quanh rất chu đáo và hợp lý. Sẽ quay lại sớm!

Die Unterkunft und der Aufenthalt bei CHI waren wirklich mehr wie fünf Sterne wert. Es ist ein traumhaftes Apartment mit einem sensationellen Ausblick und einer tollen Innenausstattung. CHI ist eine außerordentlich tolle Gastgeberin, die uns sogar mit einem Geschenk begrüßte. Könnten wir mehr wie fünf Sterne geben würden wir das tun. Sofern wir irgendwann wieder in Halong vorbeikommen, würden wir nirgendwo anders als dort schlafen wollen. Vielen lieben Dank für alles.
it was the perfect stay. everything was wonderful. chi was very kind and helpful. I would come back everytime.
Hôte très gentil et réactive. La chambre et la salle de bain sont super belle et spacieuse, le lit très confortable. La vue de la chambre est surprenante. Je vous recommande.
Comfortable place to spend a holiday with the family just next to the beach and sea, clean and cozy room, helpful landlord.

9일간의 휴가중 이곳에서 2일밖에 머무르지 못한것에 너무 안타깝습니다.
최고의 시설과 전망을 자랑하는 이곳을 여러분께 추천합니다.
chi 님은 빠른 소통과 친절함을 보여주었습니다.
다음 하롱 여행에서는 당연히 이곳에서 지내겠습니다
chi 님 편안하게 잘 지내다 갑니다^^

Was a lovely stay the bed and pillows were really comfortable big bathroom with good sized bath and shower, good facilities with washer dryer with washing liquid. Chi was really fast with responding to messages and really friendly. The building also has really good facilities as it’s has restaurants a bar, cafe, 2 pools, spa and steam room and Sona. Definitely recommend to anyone staying in the area
The ideal destination for when you want to get away you have all kinds of things to do in the area and the people of the hotel are very friendly and helpful.

Uns hat der Aufenthalt sehr gut gefallen. Wir können die Unterkunft an jeden empfehlen. Sehr sauber und ruhig. Wir haben sehr gut geschlafen.  Das Bett war sehr gemütlich.  Chi hat immer sehr schnell auf unsere Nachrichten reagiert. Haben nichts zu bemängeln.
This place is incredibly comfortable and truly amazing. The host exemplifies the warmth and generosity of Vietnamese hospitality, making the stay even more special. Highly recommended!
非常好的房东，非常好的房子，我非常满意，希望还有下次机会入住

The place has a great location. It has everything from restaurants, grocery stores, the ocean at walking distance. The apartment is spacious with spectacular views right out of every window. The space was neat and clean, and all amenities stated were present. Nam is a great host as he’s very professional, proactive and responsive. We spent 3 nights here and it was a peaceful and perfect stay. We’re definitely coming back.
lần đầu lưu trú tại hòn gai khi đến quảng ninh. chủ nhà phản hồi nhanh, căn hộ rất rộng rãi, phòng ngủ ngăn nắp, nhà vệ sinh sach sẽ. tuy nhiên quạt hút mùi wc hơi ồn, bếp cũng hơi nhiều kiến 🐜🐜🐜

Nam was very proactive and responsive in helping us with our stay. His staff are very helpful. The apparentment exceeded our expectations and the view was breathtaking. very reasonable price for the location!
Location is good and host is proactive in answering all queries.However, house was not clean and toiletries were missing.

+widok z okna był bardzo ładny
- w całym mieszkaniu czuć dziwny nieprzyjemny zapach. W kuchni nie było czym wytrzeć rąk. Brak ręczników papierowych i chusteczek. Na zlewie leżała brudna ścierka. Brak kosza na śmieci w kuchni, pod zlewem leżała reklamówka z kilkoma śmieciami. Łóżka były najgorsze w jakich kiedykolwiek spaliśmy. Masz wrażenie jakbyś spał na deskach. . Żałuję,że przedłużyła tu pobyt o jedną noc. Szkoda ,że nie można tu wrzucic zdjęć, wtedy opinia bylaby bardziej obrazowa.
Nhà rộng gần trung tâm

We really enjoyed our stay here! Nam was a great host - he accommodated us checking in early, gave great recommendations, and responded quickly when we had a question. We had a lot of space and LOVED the view from the porch. Its in a great location and we were able to walk to so many restaurants, shops, and things to do. It was a quick drive to anything we could not walk too.

this apartment is amazing: we are three and each have our own bedroom and bathroom or showers, with one more room and two beds to spare! it's very spacious and clean and the views are stunning!
the host Nam is super helpful and responsive, he even helped arrange our limo service at a reasonable price to Ha Long Bay. good restaurants nearby and the promenade by the sea is almost as good as the cruise!
Location is super nearby market and close to the attractions with sea view ... apartment was with big space, cleaned, secured and priceless

The host, Nam, was exceptionally responsive and helpful. He assisted us in booking a car from Hanoi to the apartment and even arranged our return car to Hanoi after one-day of checking out.
The apartment was spacious and conveniently located near the sea, surrounded by cafes and restaurants.

It is very spacious, and quiet... The condo has very beautiful view... both the moutain, and the beach... feel very peaceful, and relaxed... I would definitely stay here again if I ever visit Ha Long...
Very spacious and a good deal, we had a good view of the bay.
We had a great stay with a wonderful view. Would definetely come here again, thank you :)
Spacious apartment, perfect for families. .

L’appartement est très grand et avec une belle vue, ce qui est très appréciable. Malheureusement, la propreté laissait à désirer : le sol était sale, l’évier et la douche étaient bouchés, et il y avait une odeur de canalisation persistante dans tout l’appartement. De plus, les matelas étaient extrêmement durs et inconfortables. Franchement, l’appartement avait besoin d’un sérieux ménage et d’un minimum d’entretien. Je tiens aussi à souligner que la remise des clés était à 14h pile, pas une minute avant, sous peine de nous faire payer un supplément pour une arrivée précoce. Point positif quand même, on a pu stocker nos bagages de manière temporaire comme nous étions arrivés tôt le matin. Si je peux conseiller quelque chose à des voyageurs qui veulent visiter la baie d’ha long comme nous, dirigez vous plutôt vers l’île de cat ba bien plus intéressante et authentique.
Sehr liebe Gastgeberin und toller Service. Man merkt, dass sie sich wirklich viel Mühe gibt :) Unterkunft war in Top-Lage und mit super Aussicht. Äußerst empfehlenswert!
Excellent place would recommend for any small group of friends or family location the host was responsive and helpful 5 star all round!
此大廈位於下龍湾海傍大道的附近，很容易找。單位面積寬敞，可望到海景。走路十分鐘內可以找到地道餐廳，附近的咖啡店也十分多。
房東回覆很快，視野很好，入住也很容易，房間很大乾淨，床墊是沒有那麼軟，但是是在可以接受的範圍
가격대비 아주만족합니다. 뷰가 완벽한 숙소입니다. 다른게스트에게 추천합니다.
4pn
Alles wie beschrieben, sehr saubere und gute Unterkunft. Hat uns sehr gefreut!
Beautiful stay. Very spacious apartment
Tempat tinggal yang sangat nyaman. Pemilik ramah dan sangat baik

Phòng siêu đẹp
View xịn
Nhận phòng mình bất ngờ luôn
Wow

Phòng đẹp sạch sẽ, y ảnh à còn đẹp hơn rộng rãi hơn ảnh, chủ nhà trả lời nhanh, view thì quá đẹp rồi, à nếu có cái lò vi sóng nữa thì tốt quá . 10đ

Căn Hộ view tuyệt đẹp ngắm vịnh Hạ Long, ban công rộng sạch sẽ thoáng mát, căn hộ sạch đẹp rộng dãi nằm trong toà nhà à la carte thương hiệu 5* rất mới và hiện đại tại Hạ Long, tiện ích rất linh hoạt dùng gì trả phí đó, giá phòng hợp lý, rất mong muốn lần sau được trải nghiệm dịch vụ của bạn. Bạn là chủ nhà rất tốt và thân thiện…
Chị chủ nhà rất nhiệt tình, căn hộ tuyệt vời

We had a wonderful stay in Ha Long! The apartment was clean, modern, and exactly as described in the listing. The view was beautiful, and the location was perfect — close to cafes, restaurants, and the marina. The check-in was smooth, and the host was friendly and responsive.
Highly recommended for anyone visiting Ha Long!
Chủ nhà linh hoạt, nhiệt tình
Phòng sạch sẽ, tiện nghi
phòng đẹp, sạch sẽ

The view is beautiful, the apartment nicely decorated and clean. Supermarket in the building and across the street with normal prices. Grab food available in the area.
The communication with the host was nice and easy.
The walk on beach is nice, but there was a no swimming sign.

Communication with host was great even though we never met in person. Location perfect for a night before a Ha Long Cruise. Home is clean and bright. Balcony has a lovely view of the bay. Water is on a water heater so needs putting on in advance if you want a hot shower.

Bina olarak ve ev olarak her şey çok iyiydi. Herhangi bir sorun yaşamadık. Havuz kesinlikle paraya değiyor. Yemeklerinizi binanın tesislerinde yemenizi öneririm, yemek için başka yere gitmenize gerek yok ve iyi seçenekler pek yok. Bina içindeki tesislerde yemeniz daha mantıklı olacaktır. Ev sahibine her şey için teşekkürler, tur olarak da tavsiye ettiği tura gidebilirsiniz.

Mieszkanie było czyste i zgodne z opisem. Widok z balkonu był super. Budynek znajduje się z dala od centrum, w okolicy przeważnie pustych budynków. Dlatego w bliskiej odległości jest mało sklepów i restauracji. Dla osoby, która ceni sobie spokój i ciszę, polecam to miejsce.
Hue Nguyen była bardzo pomocna i dopytywała się, czy wszystko było w porządku! Polecam zatrzymać się w apartamencie Hue Nguyen!

Great apartment in new tower with the perfect view of the sun rise, and a very helpful host! The tower is currently being renovated/repaired from storm damage, so I didn't get to use the pool or restaurants. But the beach is right in front of your door, and you get a couple small restaurants in walking distance, as well as cafes, restaurants, karaoke places a 10 minute scooter drive away. Scooters are easy to rent through the host.

The place is a truly 5 stars place. Amazing views from a 28 floor balcony looking straight to a pristine beach. The apartment is luxurious and everything was pristine. Bed is extremely comfortable. The building is modern, smart and with anything you may need, and more. The host is friendly, responsive, and extremely professional.

Such a beautiful hotel-like feel for a great price. Location was remote, walking distance from the beach, and far from the city area, but close enough if you rent a scooter. They offer scooter rentals for 200k VND which made it very convenient; it even had a two-person raincoat that fit over your scooter for the rainy days. We loved the beautiful bathroom and balcony. Very clean space and had everything you'd need for a long stay. Washer-dryer unit was all in one and they also provided cleaning supplies. There were restaurants and a convenience store attached to the building. The host was very quick to respond and helpful. There's a rooftop bar, pool, gym, etc available too (I think the prices were 200k per day, but we didn't use it). We went when the beach was at low tide, it didn't seem like many people were swimming. But it was still nice to be there nonetheless. Lots of outdoor workout stations. And lots of new construction for future beach front properties/ hotels.
Absolutely one of the best experienced i have ever had on airbnb. The place was exactly like photos so clean, view was so beautiful. Will definitely be back if back in halong bay! Thank you
we really enjoyed our stay in this airbnb! it’s an enjoyable luxury condo, we liked it so much we stayed an extra night! great views and a comfy space :) definitely recommend thank you!

Amazing stay with stunning sea views at a great price! The property was spotless, cozy, and perfectly located near the beach. Watching sunsets from the balcony was unforgettable. The host was friendly and responsive. Highly recommend!
Appartamento meraviglioso e pulito vista splendida e si vede un’alba straordinaria!!! Consigliatissimo !!!!

Wir hatten eine wunderbare Zeit in der Unterkunft in Halong Bay! Die Wohnung war genauso schön wie auf den Fotos – sehr sauber, modern eingerichtet und mit allem ausgestattet, was man braucht.
Besonders hervorheben möchten wir die hervorragende Kommunikation mit der Gastgeberin. Schon im Vorfeld war der Kontakt super freundlich, schnell und sehr hilfsbereit. Während unseres Aufenthalts hat man sich proaktiv um uns gekümmert, uns tolle Tipps gegeben und war bei Fragen jederzeit erreichbar. Auch bei kurzfristigen Änderungen war die Gastgeberin extrem flexibel – das haben wir sehr geschätzt.
Wir haben uns rundum wohlgefühlt. Vielen Dank für alles

Die Unterkunft war äußerst sauber, modern und schön eingerichtet. Der Balkon mit der atemberaubenden Aussicht war unser Highlight.
Die Gastgeberin ist eine sehr hilfsbereite und zuverlässige Person, die schnell auf Anliegen reagiert hat. Alles in allem 10/10!!
Vielen Dank für die tolle Gastfreundschaft.

herausragend ♥️♥️♥️
könnte ich mehr Sterne vergeben, ich würde es sofort tun
in allen Bereichen volle Punktzahl - vuelen Dank für alles

A very very luxury apartment for the price you pay.
100% worth

I had an amazing stay at this place. The place was spotless, well-organized, and had everything a guest could possibly need. The breathtaking view of the ocean was truly the highlight of the experience, as seen from the balcony—a perfect way to start and end the day. The host was incredibly responsive, ensuring a smooth and comfortable stay. I also appreciated the thoughtful guidebook provided, which was very helpful for exploring the area. I would highly recommend this property to anyone looking for a clean, comfortable, and serene getaway.
Only cons I felt is place is isolated from tourist area, so everyday I took taxi to some affordable restaurants (hotel’s restaurant costs much) and tourist area.
But once again this place gives best view of Halong. I don’t think theres a lot place like that.

Die Unterkunft war sauber und ordentlich. Alles wie beschrieben vorhanden.
Die Ausstattung ist neuwertig und hochwertig.
Der Pool war zu unserem Zeitpunkt leider geschlossen, daher keine Bewertung.

Điều khiến mình ấn tượng nhất là nội thất ko chỉ dừng lại ở mức đẹp mà còn có vibe rất riêng và rất nghệ nữa. Cảm giác như đang thuê ks 5 sao mà giá lại rẻ hơn 1 nửa ý. Chưa kể là đồ nấu ăn, bát đũa, máy giặt đều đầy đủ hết luôn, tiện như ở nhà vậy. Mê nhất là nằm trên giường ngủ có thể nhìn thấy vịnh Cửa Lục ngay trước mắt, siêu siêu healing 🥴
Sau này có quay lại HL vẫn sẽ book condotel của anh chủ ạ. Đáng đến từng đồng luôn 😘😍

Chủ nhà nhiệt tình, phản hồi nhanh chóng.
Phòng đẹp, view rất thoáng.
Sạch sẽ, gọn gàng.
Có thể nấu nướng và ăn uống tại nhà.
Với mình có một chút bất tiện với nhà vệ sinh vì không có giá treo/móc.
Đáng trải nghiệm!
Phòng view đẹp, mở cửa phòng là mùi thơm, nhà nhiệt tình, tuy nhiên là sàn nhà đi chân trần có vẻ hơi sạn sạn

Its hard for us to have a good idea of the suroundings and all as we we're there during Wipha typhoon. That being said, we can say Hung was an amazing host! We had some hiccups with the door lock but he was always responsive and proactive. When the problem occured, he did come to the appartment in the minute to repair the lock. He did also bring us some food so we would be ok if the markets close during the typhoon. He was always a step ahead and very helpful during that scary time and we appreciated it a lot!
Mọi thứ đều tuyệt vời , vị trí đẹp ngắm biển và cầu bãi cháy ❤️

Hung is a friendly host. He responded to all my problems very quickly. The apartment is more beautiful than in the pictures, high floor view overlooking the sea. I really refreshed myself with 2 days of experience here.
Helpful, instructive and friendly host. The place is easy to get in and around to Ha Long and Bai Chay. Highly recommended for its price, comfortability and convenience.
Beautiful building apartment with amazing bay and bridge views. Super responsive host who was always willing to help. I really would like to come back to this place
endroit peu touristique qui fait du bien au Milieu de la population locale
Extremely easy check in and responsive host!

Kiera rất dễ thương và thân thiện! Mình đi chơi nên chỉ về ngủ thôi nhưng vẫn cảm thấy nhà ở gọn gàng, phòng ngủ và phòng vệ sinh rất sạch sẽ!
Phòng đơn giản nhưng đầy đủ đồ dùng từ máy sấy, bàn là, bản chải kem đánh răng…
Mặc dù mình đặt phòng lấy gấp vài tiếng trước khi check in nhưng Kiera vẫn hỗ trợ hết sức có thể.
Nếu quay lại Quảng Ninh mình vẫn sẽ chọn ở đây
Host rất thân thiện dù không gặp nhiều nhưng host vẫn luôn sp mình trên app. Home rất tuyệt nha! Như trên ảnh và rất sạch sẽ
Kiera rất thân thiện và nice, hỗ trợ nhiệt tình. Phòng view đẹp dù buổi chiều sẽ nắng gắt vào mùa hè do ở hướng tây
Bạn chủ nhà cực dễ thương. Rất tinh tế và nhiệt tình. Mình chắc chắn sẽ quay lại khi có cơ hội.
Căn hộ dễ thương, tầng cao nhìn ra phía đảo Tuần Châu, gần biển. Có bếp nên nấu mấy món nhẹ nhẹ được. Bạn chủ nhà nhiệt tình, vui vẻ.

Vị trí tìm dễ dàng, chỗ ăn và chơi cũng chỉ quanh quanh đó 3km đổ lại

הדירה נותנת תמורה למחיר בגודל, בנוף ובמתקנים בה. נדרשת מונית כדי להגיע לכל המקומות אבל דרך גראב הדבר פשוט יחסית. לדוברי אנגלית ולא ויאטנאמית התקשורת מעט קלוקלת- המארחים זמינים מאוד אבל אינם דוברי אנגלית והכול נעשה בהתכתבות דרך גוגל טרנסלייט שלא תמיד ברור..  לסיכום תמורה טובה למחיר למי שמגיע להאלונג לכמה ימים ומעוניין באטרקציות יומיות באזור

We had a blast!
Pros:
• The penthouse matched all the pictures with a fully-equipped kitchen. There were 6 wine glasses, plenty of shot glasses and lots of cooking utensils.
• All the decoration was done nicely and the lighting was great (bedrooms even had floor lights).
• The balcony was HUGE and even had a BBQ grill that we regretted not bringing food to use it.
• The host was very responsive and helpful, helping us in every way they could.
• There were 1-2 small grocery stores on the ground floor. They even sold ice!
• There was a Vietcombank ATM right at the entrance.
• This complex doesn’t have much of a nice view but they have a large playground on the inner yard.
Cons:
• The TV in the master bedroom seemed like a domestic Chinese product, unlike the TV in the living room. We couldn’t access anything with that Chinese-only display (no YouTube or Netflix buttons).
• There is no microwave in the kitchen.
• Ceiling/floor is not very thick or soundproof.
Highly recommended!

• Hướng dẫn rõ ràng, support từng vấn đề mình cần hỗ trợ từ lúc đặt đến trả phòng
🛏️ Phòng ở:

🧹 Dọn phòng thêm (có phụ phí)

❌ Điểm trừ duy nhất: tiếng ồn – 8/10
• Căn hộ trong toà A La Carte Residence nên khách khá đông
• Buổi tối có thể nghe tiếng nói chuyện nếu khách nói chuyện lớn ở hành lang, hoặc trẻ nhỏ
• Buổi trưa, tiếng cô dọn phòng ở các phòng khác nói lớn, hơi gay gắt. Phần này mình nghĩ các host có thể góp ý để mấy cô tiết chế và đỡ ảnh hưởng tới trải nghiệm khách hàng.
Tổng kết: 9.5/10 🩷🩷🩷

it was good. the location , view and amenities everything was top notch.

We had such an amazing stay! Both of our hosts were incredibly supportive and helpful throughout the trip — and to top it off, they even gave us small gifts at the end of our stay. That was such a lovely surprise!
The room itself was absolutely stunning — from the breathtaking view to the stylish design and top-notch facilities. Everything was well-equipped and truly felt like a 5-star hotel experience.
I've stayed at many hotels and vacation rentals before, but this is the first time I felt genuinely happy and comfortable like this.
A must-try if you're visiting Ha Long!
The room is great, and so is the host. The owner is honest, enthusiastic, and delicate. It makes me comfortable here because I feel like the host will always be ready to support me at any time

10/10 stay, if i could give a higher rating i would!! Such a lovely apartment. Everything was perfect. Amazing attention to detail throughout the apartment. The host was so lovely, provided everything I needed and more. I would definitely recommend staying here if you would like a fabulous place to relax and enjoy some amazing views of the bay!

The host was sensational and the room was big and cool. Very beautiful views from the balcony and we just loved everything. Again, the host was number 1 and super kind. Everything was there for us and we could just focus to relax. We wish we had stayed longer and plan to return again. All-star
Căn hộ sạch, rộng rãi, decor nhẹ nhàng hiện đại. Điểm cộng là ban công rộng nhìn ra vịnh và bồn lắm lớn. Chị chủ thân thiện, supportive. Highly recommend
the best stay!!  the apartment we stayed in was amazing. host is incredibly helpful. anytime I'm in the area I will look for Bella Vista airbnb.

Truly a rare sanctuary. Peaceful, immaculate, and intuitively designed for both rest and productivity. Yet the true treasure is Hang. Her quiet generosity, discreet attentiveness, and graceful spirit imbue the home with soul. Her husband, equally kind and humble, adds to the warmth of the home with his good humor and hospitality. What was meant as a brief stay became a deeply healing chapter of nearly three months. We left with full hearts, grateful for every breeze, every sunrise, and every gentle kindness.
From the windows, you’re not just gazing at a view you’re witnessing the quiet majesty of a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Ha Long Bay stretches out like a living painting, shifting with light and mist in a way that never grows old.
There’s even a fantastic restaurant right on the ground floor. Many of there dishes are beyond delicious and perfect after a long day of exploring.
This is more than a home it is a haven for those seeking meaning, beauty, and connection. 100/5 stars.

窓からの海の眺めが素晴らしいアパートです。
近くにコンビニ、レストラン、海鮮市場なんでもあり、立地も素晴らしい。
メール返事も早く文句のつけようがない。

It was very kind when we are greating by the owner. They are very professional and warm. Their space very clean, nice decoration with amazing view to Halong Bay.
We have 3 person, but they dont charge any fee, free mineral water, and enough towel for 3 of us.
Next time, I will be back with my family.
Many tks to the Host and all best wishes are for them 🥰
We absolutely loved the apartment!! Very nice and clean and the TV was great.

hôte exceptionnel !
logement comme décrit, propre, énorme salle de bain avec douche et baignoire.
proximité de la plage.
En plus de 10 ans de Airbnb c'est 1 des meilleurs à tout point de vue !

This place was exactly as advertised and the hosts were incredibly helpful and available and easy to communicate with. I would recommend this place to anyone looking for a beautiful place to stay in Ha Long!

Needed a place to chill over Christmas holidays. Giant TV, balcony, full table to do a puzzle, comfy bed( a little in the firm side), and great shower. We hardly left the apartment. There is a restaurant on site so you literally don’t have to leave the hotel if you don’t won’t to. Didn’t use the pool or gym but they looked nice. WiFi works great. Ha long Bay is absolutely dead in the winter and the views are not great this time of year. It made it a great destination to literally do nothing which was perfect for us. Host was great and very responsive and provided suggestions.
A lovely accommodation with stunning views of Ha Long Bay. The bed was comfortable, and the bathtub was a great touch. Also suitable for work. We enjoyed our stay and would recommend it!
Thanks for everything. It was all perfect. I highly recommend.
Wir haben 2 Nächte in der Unterkunft verbracht. Das Studio ist sehr groß und gepflegt. Das absolute Highlight ist der Ausblick auf die Halong Bay. Unvergesslich.

I recently had an unforgettable stay at Citadines Marina Halong Bay. From the moment I arrived, the staff made me feel welcome and safe. There’s a little grocery downstairs open all day until 11pm. The hosts were especially amazing, they were always friendly, ready to help, and full of great local tips. A thoughtful New Year’s surprise even added that extra personal touch!
Waking up to the breathtaking views of Halong Bay, was a daily delight. Plus, the location is incredibly convenient—just a short walk/drive away from popular attractions, dining spots, and boat tours.
If you’re planning a trip to Halong Bay, I highly recommend Citadines Marina for its blend of stunning scenery, outstanding service, and prime accessibility. It’s perfect for couples, solo travelers, and I can’t wait to go back!
Beautiful modern home, with amazing beach view. The house is fully equipped, with a small Christmas tree to match with the holiday. Super comfortable bed. Love it!
😍good place

Nice apartment, good Internet, it was a bit cold though (end of February). Kitchen was well equipped (plates are in the bottom right drawer, not so easy to find xd )

Now for the cons of this stay. You will stay a bit further away from the main part of Halong , so you will need to pay taxi or rent a bike. The location doesnt have much to offer that would be in close distance. Felt like we stayed in a place for locals mainly, we were almost the only foreigners.
The kitchen could be better equipped, there is not a lot of cutlery or plates, no toaster, only very small cups and the pans could be cleaner.

Had a lovely, relaxing stay at Thuy's place.  Thuy is very helpful with local recommendations, and always responded quickly.  I would highly recommend Thuy's place if you prefer staying among locals. The place is spotless, with plenty of room and amenities.
Very beautiful apartment, clean, cosy and with a great view.  The host very helpful and responsive, highly recommend 🙌

Thuys lejlighed er rigtig god til prisen! Lys, rumlig, ren og moderne. Let at checke ind. Thuy svarer rigtig hurtigt ved spørgsmål - hun er en rigtig god vært!
Grunden til at lejligheden får 4/5 stjerner, skyldes mangler i køkkenet. Det beskrives at køkkenet har alt tilbehør, men dette er ikke tilfældet. Der mangler både almindelige knive eller skeer til service og der er ingen ovn eller mikroovn i køkkenet. Man er desuden afhængig af køkkenet, da spisestederne kun er åbne på meget specifikke tidspunkter. Hvis man er sulten kl. 03 om eftermiddagen, er det svært at finde mad og køkkenet er her nødvendigt. Desuden er næsten alt lukket i området. Der er ikke meget at se, stranden er fuld af byggerod og alt er som skrevet lukket. Vi ønskede at leje scootere, men dette var lukket, så det var svært at komme til den anden ende af Ha Long. Hvis man blot ønsker et overnatningssted inden eller efter Ha Long Bay, er lejligheden et godt bud - særligt til prisen.

Thuys place is as described and looks exactly as the pictures. All the provided amenities worked well.
There is a mini mart on the ground floor which is handy.
Good location for joining cruise of Halong bay. There are some Vietnamese local eating places and coffee shops. The main restaurant are a short drive away. Grab works well if you need one.
Todo genial, hemos estado a gusto y el barrio tiene de todo y es muy moderno.

Very pleasant stay,  good location, if the price is considered it is the best location and the best apartment money can buy, most places with the same accommodations are five times more expensive, even though some are very close to the beach, if you don't mind walking 15 mins, or taking a grab or renting a scooter the beach is like 1.5 km or 1 mile away , everything is super clean, the a/c is super cold, all the stores on the ground floor are very good. Tuan Chau ferry station is also like 4km away, quick drive and you are on your way to cat ba, in general it is the best place one can rent, loved it!!!

Thủy is an excellent host who is responsive, considerate and attentive. Check in instructions were clear and easy to understand. The apartment was bigger than what we thought. It’s comfy and has amenities for when we wanted to cook and a handy washing machine. The surrounding is peaceful and we can see Ha Long Bay from the bedroom window. The wifi is fast - we were getting around 100mbps on the upload and download. There are many marts and eateries within easy walking distance. There’s also a great local market area only a couple of minutes walk away, which is cheap and with lots of fresh produce. We enjoyed it so much we extended our stay. Highly recommend.

I had a fantastic day at Thuy's Airbnb, which had a pool and a view of the bay. The flat was large, modern, and comfortable. It has everything needed for a relaxing stay. She was incredibly helpful and provided me with numerous suggestions for things to do in Ha Long. I would highly suggest this place to anyone visiting Ha Long: I would stay at Thuy's Airbnb again when returning to Ha Long Bay. It was one of the most enjoyable Airbnb experiences I'd ever had. Thank you for making my trip so memorable, Thuy!

Mình đã có trải nghiệm rất dễ chịu tại đây. Phòng sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi và đúng như mô tả. Vị trí thuận tiện, gần trung tâm, dễ di chuyển. Chủ nhà cực kỳ thân thiện và phản hồi nhanh mọi câu hỏi của mình, tạo cảm giác rất thoải mái.

Nhà mình (5 người lớn) vừa nghỉ tại homestay anh Long ❤️❤️. Vị trí phòng đẹp, gần biển, Sun World, quán sữa chua cô Phượng và cảng. Dưới nhà có tạp hoá, tiện dạo quanh. Nhà mình thích không gian ấm cúng, sạch sẽ, phòng khách và 2 phòng ngủ đều view biển. Nhà có đầy đủ tiện nghi, có máy giặt. Anh chị chủ nhà siêu dễ thương, hỗ trợ nhiệt tình. Nhà mình ra ngoài và được anh chị hỗ trợ cấ đồ hơn 12 tiếng khi nhà mình ra ngoài chơi. Cái này thật sự nhà mình ko biết gửi đồ ở đâu. May có anh chị hỗ trợ. Gia đình mình chắc chắn sẽ quay lại nếu có dịp đến Hạ Long!
Cả nhà chúc anh chị luôn được book full phòng quanh năm 🤩🤩
Nhà sạch đẹp, tất cả các phòng đều view biển. B chủ nhà phản hồi nhanh và support nhiệt tình

Gia đình chúng tôi đã có một kỳ nghỉ vui vẻ tại căn hộ của chủ nhà. Chủ nhà đón tiếp niềm nở, hỗ trợ check in sớm, hướng dẫn tỉ mỉ và gợi ý cho chúng tôi các địa điểm ăn uống và vui chơi gần đó. Chủ nhà vô cùng thân thiện và nhiệt tình. Căn hộ có vị trí thuận tiện để di chuyển, riêng tư cho gia đình, view rất đẹp. Tuy nhiên tôi thấy sàn nhà chưa được sau thực sự sạch khi chúng tôi đến. Một điểm trừ là nước của căn hộ yếu, nếu chúng tôi tắm ở một phòng tắm thì phòng tắm còn lại không có nước, cũng như vòi nước ở bồn rửa bát sẽ hết, vậy nên chúng tôi phải đợi nhau lần lượt. Ngoài ra căn hộ không có quạt cho tất cả các phòng, gia đình chúng tôi không muốn sử dụng điều hoà 24/24 nhưng không có quạt nên bắt buộc phải bật điều hoà vì nóng. Tuy nhiên tôi đánh giá đây vẫn là một nơi cho gia đình chúng tôi những trải nghiệm đẹp.
Tòa chung cư hơi cũ nhưng địa điểm thuận tiện, nhà gọn gàng, sạch sẽ
Phòng có view biển siêu ưng, 2 phòng ngủ đều có view biển luôn 😗

mọi thứ đều tuyệt vời, căn hộ đáng thuê với view đẹp đỉnh, vị trí trung tâm và sạch sẽ tiện nghi
Chỗ ở và host rất nhiệt tình và thân thiện

Our host, Long, is super friendly, quick to respond, and a nice guy. 5 stars for his services.
The view from the room is spectacular. Better than the picture. If you are looking for a reasonably priced, family friendly place with an incredible postcard perfect view, I would highly recommend this space and for Long's willingness to help.
Do note that there is a new regulations putting in effect that require tourist (particularly short term renters) to pay an additional fee for the usage of the pool. It appears that regulation comes from the government.
Regardless, the space is worth it for the view of Ha Long Bay and for the host's friendliness and knowledge of Ha Long.

long的房间非常干净，人也非常热情，我们出去玩提前退房，long和他的姐姐还帮我们保管行李。我们一家人都感觉非常好
everything was perfect and clean, long was super helpful with the instructions and tips.

Chỗ ở tại toà Alacarte Hạ long rất mới và sạch sẽ. Ở căn hộ rất tiện nghi, mọi vận dụng đều có như ở nhà. Thuận tiện cho nhóm bạn hay gia đình đi du lịch. Giá cả hợp lý. Tuy nhiên, phòng tại khu du lịch mà không có gương soi toàn thân hoặc gương tại bàn trang điểm (không tiện cho các bạn nữ trang điểm hay ngắm đồ). Còn lại mọi thứ đều tuyệt. Nên ở!!!!!!!!

Phòng y như trong ảnh, sạch sẽ và đầy đủ. Nhưng em ở 3 ngày 2 đêm giấy vệ sinh chỉ có 1 cuộn 1 phòng và khăn tắm cũng sẽ chỉ có vào ngày đầu. Hơn nữa điều hoà phòng 2 giường nhỏ lúc nào bật lên vài tiếng sau sẽ tự động tắt, sẽ gây bất tiện vì lúc ngủ phải dậy nhiều lần. Sẽ rất tuyệt nếu được check out vào 12h ạ. We had a lovely stay at the Alacarte apartment as a family of three. The apartment was fully furnished, clean, and comfortable. We especially enjoyed the beautiful view and how close it was to the beach. There were plenty of food options nearby, making everything super convenient. Highly recommended for a relaxing getaway!

The accommodation has a very nice view, there are many places to eat around and not far from the center. The beach is close although it is new so there are not many trees yet. The apartment is quite clean and fully equipped, very worth the money to experience

This stay was great value for money, the apartment was top quality with lovely views. The facilities in the block were also top quality (you do have to pay to use the pools- but we knew that). We only stayed for two nights and we did a day cruise so didn’t explore the local area much, the beach was right next to the apartments and there are some local supermarkets & eateries also very close.
Chủ nhà nên quản lý tốt hơn để không làm ảnh hưởng tới chuyến đi của khách hàng

We're travelling from the uk . Great experience . Lovely view to the beach,great location and have all Utilities you need such as 4 Seasons swimming pool , kid play ground, restaurants , coffee shop , Gym ,..Very easy to access to very lovely and helpful host, quick response to your question . Rooms and toilets is very clean . Definitely worth the money you pay. We definitely come back again

דירה מומלצת מאוד! מקום שהרגיש לנו כמו הבית. לקום כל בוקר לנוף הנפלא והמושלם של הדירה הזו היה כיף ומיוחד!
המקום נקי חדש ומסודר עם כל מה שצריך.
הגענו לתקופה ארוכה ואהבנו כל רגע בדירה הזו!
תודה רבה על זמן משפחתי קסום!
ממליצים בחום

This is the second time I and my partner return to this apartment. Absolutely delight with the service we received. The place is pristine and well designed. Love the fact that we could watch the beautiful sunset and sunrise from our balcony. The sea view and sky line of Halong Bay from the apartment was just something that took our breath away. The host is so attentive, always on hand to respond to our needs. She went over and above to make sure we had a wonderful stay. We highly recommend this place to everyone.

I feel so lucky to find this little gem. The apartment is quiet and private, yet so closed to other amenities and HaLong Bay attractions. Love the fact the beauty, sandy beach is right in front of the building. The host is attentive and friend. Wish I could stay longer.

Great place
Great Host
Wonderful
하롱베이에서 나쁘지 않은 선택입니다
Great deal and fantastic place!
Perfect

Gia đình tui có trải nghiệm rất tốt. Chủ nhà vui vẻ, nhiệt tình hỗ trợ. Không gian ấm cúng, đủ nội thất, tiện nghi. Thời tiết Hạ Long khá ổn, chủ nhà còn giới thiệu cho chúng tôi nhiều nhà hàng và quán ăn chất lượng. Hỗ trợ cực kỳ nhiệt tình. Nói chung nếu có lần sau nhất định sẽ quay lại
Chủ nhà nhiệt tình,phản hồi các yêu cầu của mình nhanh, tư vấn các điểm đi chơi và quán ăn ngon. Phòng sạch sẽ, đủ đồ dùng. Giống ảnh. Mình sẽ quay lại 🫶🏻

We had such a great time at S Villa. The villa is super spacious, beautifully designed and comes with everything you need – pool, jacuzzi, sauna, and even a fun kids’ room. It really felt like a retreat where our family could relax and enjoy time together. The host was also very kind and helpful. Definitely a place we’d love to come back to!

Căn phòng gọn gàng, sạch sẽ nằm trong khu dân cư với rất nhiều tiện ích. Tôi có thể dễ dàng tìm được quán ăn dù nhận phòng vào buổi tối muộn. Chủ nhà đã hướng dẫn tôi rất chi tiết và tỉ mỉ, khiến việc nhận phòng của tôi trở nên dễ dàng. Từ căn hộ này tôi có thể tới khu du lịch Bãi Cháy khá gần. Tôi sẽ  quay lại khi tới Hạ Long lần sau!
Rất hài lòng với căn phòng sạch sẽ, tiện nghi và ấm cúng
We stayed at Giang's for two nights. The room was suitable for our needs. Giang was very responsive host.
Exactly as described. Amazing location and host was very friendly. Would highly recommend :)
Căn hộ rất ấn tượng với ban công nhìn thẳng ra vịnh Hạ Long. Thoải mái như ở nhà 👍
We had a lovely stay in this airbnb and the view from the building on the bay is incredible!

The apartment is nice, with a beautiful view from the room and bathroom. Check-in was smooth, and the Giang was very communicative. However, cleanliness could be improved. The balcony was very dusty, and the table and chairs there were extremely dirty—I had to wipe them multiple times. Inside, the cupboards with dishes weren’t clean, and I even found mold where the cutlery was stored. The towels smelled of dust, so I had to wash them. The table and chairs inside were hard and uncomfortable for long work hours, but extra cushions helped👌😊Despite these issues, the apartment is worth its price🥹. The host is wonderful, and with small improvements, this place could be amazing!
The view alone makes it a memorable place🥹, and the host’s helpfulness added to the positive experience🤍. A bit more attention to cleanliness and furniture comfort would make it even better for travelers.🙏🤍☺️

The space is more beautiful than the pictures. Great view from balcony in a nice apartment. Clean, well equipped and looked after. The host is very responsive and helped me with what I were wondering about.
I highly recommend for both short stay or long stay.

The host is super-friendly and always tries her best to communicate with me. She helps me with everything I need. Also, the listing has all the amenities I need.  The place is located in the centr area, so it's easy to go to different places from there. Highly recommend!

Ich hatte einen klasse Aufenthalt bei Giang.
Die Wohnung ist makellos und wie auf den Fotos beschrieben.
Der Ausblick vom Balkon & dem Badezimmer astrein.
Ich habe meine Zeit dort sehr genossen.
Giang ist eine 5 Sterne Gastgeberin was Kommunikation und Hilfsbereitschaft angeht. Wärmstens weiterzuempfehlen, ich werde wiederkommen, danke für den tollen Aufenthalt.
Very nice host , good place!
Comfortable and quiet place 👌🏻

Excellente prestation
Très bonne réactivité de Giang
Idéal pour visiter la baie
A recommander chaudement
good
👍🏼 bien dans l’ensemble
The apartament was excellent and I loved my stay there! The gym and pool are like 200m down the road so maybe consider including that in the description.

This Air bnb is a little out of the main restaurant areas, but grabs and taxis are very cheap.
Be aware that the pool is 70,000VND to use.
The flat is small, but better than it looks in the photos. Communication is 5 star. Very good value for price, I highly recommend for short visits.
Nhà rất mới sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi. Gửi xe quanh nhà miễn phí hoặc dưới hầm 60k 1 đêm. Chủ nhà nhiệt tình phản hồi rất nhanh, hướng dẫn rất chi tiết.
Nhà mới sạch sẽ ,  Cô Chủ thân thiện & rất nhiệt tình

Mình đặt để tiện cho việc di chuyển concert, chị chủ nhà siêu siêu thân thiện hỗ trợ check in sớm, trả lời phản hồi nhanh chóng. Phòng thì khỏi nói căn siêu rộng, siêu đã. Mình ở 1 mình mà lăn lộn từ trên xuống dưới
Căn Duplex view đẹp, gần biển, diện tích rộng, chủ nhà hỗ trợ thân thiện
A duplex apartment, unique, comfortable, with open sea-view

Bạn chủ rất nhiệt tình. Căn hộ rất mới và sạch. Khu chung cư rất hiện đại, có bể bơi vô cực rất đẹp (nhưng phải trả phí), có khu vui chơi miễn phí sạch đẹp cho trẻ em. Trong phòng có máy giặt sấy nên rất tiện cho việc đảm bảo có đủ quần áo để mặc trong suốt chuyến đi. Nhìn chung đây là căn hộ tôi ưng ý nhất trong những chuyến đi Hạ Long gần đây.
Chỗ ở sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi, có bãi biển ngay sát nên rất tiện. Chủ nhà thân thiện, hướng dẫn nhiệt tình. Sẽ quay lại vào dịp khác.
Nhà đẹp, chủ nhà thân thiện dễ thương
公寓旁边就是洲际度假村，不远处就是海滩，可以看到下龙湾全景，客房干净卫生明亮，落地窗很漂亮，面积很大，非常现代化，附近有超市和咖啡馆，性价比很高

This apartment feels like a five-star hotel experience. From my arrival, everything exceeded expectations. The full-length windows frame the most breathtaking views of Ha Long Bay — waking up to the mountains and water was unforgettable. The bed was heavenly to sink into, with crisp white sheets and comfortable pillows, and the whole apartment is immaculately clean. The bathroom has plentiful hot water and excellent water pressure, plus the luxury of lying in the bath while gazing out to the mountains — pure bliss.
The building itself is spectacular, with a sky bar on the 40th floor, a stunning infinity pool (especially magical at night), and even a beach right at the doorstep. The location is peaceful, yet for $1 you can hop on a motorbike and be in the centre of the tourist area.
Seamles check-in and attentive host making sure everything was perfect. If you’re a solo traveller wanting a touch of luxury or a couple seeking a romantic escape, this place is perfection. I shall return.
Phòng Duplex rộng rãi, sang trọng với thiết kế hai tầng thoáng đãng, nội thất cao cấp, tầm nhìn biển siêu đẹp và đầy đủ tiện nghi—hoàn hảo cho kỳ nghỉ thoải mái và đẳng cấp. ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Phòng rất đẹp, view nhìn ra biển đón bình minh hoàng hôn, tiện nghi đầy đủ, sẽ quay lại nếu có dịp

1000/10, This place absolutely blew my expectations. The scenery was astounding, and so peaceful. Perfect spot with restaurants down below, and that view from almost every room was breath taking. Host was very helpful letting me know how to check in and really communicative. Would recommend to anyone coming to Ha Long Bay- thanks so much for letting me stay!
Căn hộ view rất đẹp và giống như hình. Xin cảm ơn chủ nhà. Tôi sẽ quay lại vào dịp gần nhất

Nice apartment, with fantastic high-floor view of Ha Long Bay. The apartment block is well located between the local port and a good selection of restaurants, although both are a taxi ride away.
Great value for our short stay.
Chủ nhà thân thiện, phản hồi tư vấn nhiệt tình.

What made the experience even better was the host. They were incredibly friendly, welcoming, and helpful throughout my entire stay. From check-in to check-out, everything was smooth and comfortable.
I would highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a peaceful, clean, and well-designed stay with a host who truly cares about your experience. Definitely a 5-star homestay!

We had a good stay at Van Anh’s place. The house has beautiful views. We had only two issues, dryer machine is not available as mentioned in the amenities(we had to pay and use the dryer from hotel service) and there was no electricity for >2 hrs during our stay due to some maintenance. Also host could have provided minimal drinking water bottles, but didn’t.
Still, the views from the living room deck on a slow morning makes up for everything!

If you're looking for a place near the Halong Bay cruise docks, this is a fantastic choice! The property was exactly as described — clean, well-equipped, and with stunning ocean views from every room and the balcony. Having a convenience store right in the building was super handy, and it’s just a quick 10-minute Grab ride to the city center. My family had a wonderful stay and would definitely recommend it.

We loved staying with Vân, she was extremely helpful. The apartment was incredible, amazing views, had everything you needed. Would definitely come back to stay and would recommend to anyone visiting Ha Long Bay. She organised everything we needed and was very quick to reply. couldn't ask for much more. Thankyou Vân
The penthouse is beautiful and better than what we had imagined. It has scenic views of the Halong and other islands. It is perfect for a group of upto six people and matches the description.
Phòng tuyệt đẹp mọi thứ rất tuyệt vời

heel indrukwekkende penthouse wanneer je binnenstapt, echter vallen al heel gauw een aantal zaken op: geen wc papier, beschadigde  vloer, beschadigde badkamermeubel, vlekken  in de keuken, schoonmaakvodden lagen nog in de badkamer, kapotte stoel op het terras, er hingen nog doeken/ handdoeken op het wasrek buiten,  .... allemaal in schril contrast met de grote en toch vrij recente penthouse. heel moeilijke communicatie met de host die dagen lang niet reageert. goed voor 1 nacht, meer zeker niet.

The condo view and location is great. The gym and restaurants in the building are the best part of this listing- that’s where the positives end. The kitchen was disgusting and unusable for the entire stay due to a horrible fish smell, mold, and old food in the sink. Mold and clumps of hair were present in all bathrooms. There is only one key card available that lets us access the room’s floor which makes difficulties for a group larger than two. There was no toilet paper in the room on the night we arrived and when we asked for more, we were only given 4 rolls for a one week stay with 4 people. There are few trash cans and they are all tiny and there is no way to empty the trash. It was confusing and unclear in how to get to the room because there are two sets of elevators in the building, one for the hotel and one for the condos where we were staying. Overall OK airBNB but could be much better.

The apartment was as described - 2 floor duplex with spectacular view throughout. Furnitures and appliances all worked well. We were able to check in 30 min earlier which was nice. Location is good and safe.
However, we have a few feedbacks for the host for future improvements:
- Host was cold and not responsive before our stay. When our booking was confirmed (3 days before check-in), she only sent us a phone number via airbnb app. We were confused and had to call multiple times to ask a few questions (parking, check in time, location). During our stay, she was responsive when we texted.
- The apartment had places that need to be cleaned more thoroughly (balcony) and higher window.
- The listing advertised the pool and amenities but we were not able to get in without purchasing extra, as they belong to the hotel which is in the same building. Host asked us to pay extra for tickets to the pool.
Overall, it’s an okay stay for the view and the price, but definitely could be better.

럭셔리하고 깨끗하고 인테리어도 훌륭합니다
호스트 역시 친절하며 응답이 빠릅니다
조용하고 뷰가 좋습니다
굳이 단점이 하나 있다면 2층 에어컨 팬 청소를 하면 더 시원하게 머물수 있을것 같습니다
1층은 매우 시원한데 2층이. 조금 약해서 아쉬웠습니다
하자만 또 하롱에 오게된다면 재방문하고 싶습니다

A beautiful and spacious two bedroom apartment. The wrap around balcony provides stunning views across Ha Long Bay. The apartment is kitted out with everything required included Netflix on the TV. The complex includes a restaurant and a supermarket. The pool (pictured) is available at an extra cost. Vân Anh was a responsive host. An enjoyable stay overall.

The apartment itself was as described in the pictures and the view was amazing.
We had a very nice stay, however since we were 5 people only 2 beds were there, which required us to adjust in the available space.

Flexible check-in, was able to check in early but the place wasn’t cleaned thoroughly. A pair of bikini bottoms and razor was left from the previous stay in the master bathroom. The interior space is in abit of deteriorating condition, the flooring is coming apart. However, this penthouse has the most amazing view that is unbeaten. The view on its own makes the stay worth it even considering everything else. We simply did a quick wipe down of all surfaces with disinfectant wipes and we felt it was sufficient. The place is very spacious and comfortable. Thank you for hosting us!

Căn hộ đẹp, tầm nhin ra biển rất đẹp và đáng tiền, nhưng có một nhược điểm là các phòng khi đóng cửa lại đều không thể bắt được sóng wifi, Wifi chỉ hoạt động ở phòng khách. ngoài ra khi ra khỏi phòng phải rút thẻ từ. điện trong nhà bị mất. máy giặc không thể hoạt động. thật lãng phia thời gian khi phải chờ đợi máy giặc rồi mới có thể ra ngoài.
Great place to stay. Incredible view and amazing rooftop bar
Wonderful luxury stay overlooking Halong Bay! Would absolutely recommend

非常開心能遇到這麼棒的住宿！非常喜歡這個房源！空間非常大，不但整潔舒服，而且風景非常美。房東很友善，在我們到來的時候歡迎我們，也解答了我們的問題，亦為我們找到很好的夜市景點。住在這裏兩晚的時間，是我整個越南旅程中，讓我最放鬆以及回復體力的好地方。特別推薦浴缸，真的讓我非常減壓。而我最喜歡的地方是，早上起來的時候，能看到在晨光下非常耀眼的海洋，打開窗吹來的風也非常舒服。實在謝謝房東讓我入住！
I'm very happy to have found such a wonderful place to stay! I really love this accommodation! The space is very large, not only clean and comfortable, but also has a beautiful view. The host is very friendly; they welcomed us upon arrival, answered our questions, and even helped us find great night market spots. Staying here for two nights was the most relaxing and rejuvenating part of my entire trip to Vietnam. I especially recommend the bathtub, which really helped me unwind. My favorite moment was waking up in the morning to see the dazzling ocean in the morning light, with a lovely breeze coming through the open window. Thank you so much to the host for allowing me to stay!

All of them gave 5 stars. The only thing we are not satisfied with is that we checked out at 12 o'clock, but the cleaning lady came in at 11 o'clock to clean up, so we had to pack up and leave immediately.

Căn hộ view đẹp tuyệt vời, đầy đủ tiện nghi. Vân Anh là chủ nhà tuyệt vời. Gia đình tôi có cháu nhỏ, Vân Anh đã tạo điều kiện cho chúng tôi check in sớm. Cảm ơn Vân Anh rất nhiều. Lần sau quay lại tôi sẽ tiếp tục ở đây

The appartment is stunning with amazing views ! The value for money is great especially if you are 4 people.
Just pool/ jacuzzi and gym are at an extra charge for about 120K / 160K VND per Person.
The host doesn’t speak English so you need to rely on Google translate or her friend
Chủ nhà support , phòng đẹp.
The view is spectacular and lots of memories made there… great and friendly neighborhood and nightlife… highly recommended and will definitely come back to visit…
The view is amazing as described. The location is convenient, only 5-10 mins drive to the centre. Ky Anh is super responsive!!!

Phòng đẹp , sạch sẽ và gọn gàng ấm cúng lắm ạ . Giường còn êm và mềm hơn cả giường ở nhà của bọn em . Căn bếp thì đầy đủ mọi thiết bị , phòng tắm thì không phải lo về việc mất nước nóng giữa chừng . Điều tuyệt vời hơn là cả căn nhà thơm mùi đào , đúng mùi em thít . chủ nhà thân thiện quan tâm và nhiệt tình ( special thanks to A Hải , shout out to chị Quản gia 🤙🏻 )
Chúng em sẽ quay lại nếu có cơ hội và mong rằng sẽ không bị ngộ độc thực phẩm nữa hahahaha
Chỗ ở sạch sẽ, trang trí đẹp. Chủ nhà trả lời tin nhắn nhanh, vị trí gần bãi biển khá chill. Rất đáng tiền và sẽ quay lại nếu có dịp ❤️

Phòng đẹp, sạch sẽ, view xéo biển, ban đêm đẹp.
Mình đã có 2 đêm khá hài lòng ở đây. Điểm trừ duy nhất có thể là chủ nhà phản hồi hơi lâu.

AnAn was a super helpful and friendly host. She helped us to book a boat cruise and organise our transportation there 😊 the apartment is super cute with a nice big bathroom and all the facilities you need. The hotel it was located in had a very fancy rooftop bar as well as buffet breakfast available for a fee.  We have no complaints, would recommend!

This is the second time I'm staying at An An's place and it was just as splendid as the first time! An An is very quick to respond and helped us out with all our queries. The sunset views are incredible! Grab services very easily here since we found cabs easily and ordered our dinner via grab. My only regret is that we did not have time to use the pool this time!

Modern and well equipped apartment, air conditioning was a godsend in the serious heat. Clean and comfortable.
Location was a little way from the main town so you will need to get cabs everywhere. This is also in a very busy apartment complex.

We really enjoyed staying in the apartment. The vibe is really comfortable and it has a great view. The facilities of the hotel was super perfect and easy to access. The host is super kind and accommodating and helpful!
Phòng ổn, view ok, sạch sẽ và tiện nghi phù hợp với 2 ng

we had a wonderful stay in Trangs apartment. the view is amazing, and the apartment has a lot of space. check in was very easy and Trang is very kind. she organised us a very cool boat tour! the apartment wasn't super clean, but I just sweeped it in the beginning of our stay ones and then it was perfect. I can definitely recommend a stay here! :)

Trang's place was wonderful. It was just like in the pictures.
It's actually walking distance from a beach. There are some small restaurants and shops nearby. The view is nice. And the place had a pretty warm and nice vibe.
Trang also gave us a lot of recommendations of nearby places to eat at. She was proactive and responded very quickly.
We were very happy to stay here and grateful for a kind host.
Thanks!
We had a lovely one night stay. Beautiful apartment for such a great price! Hotel had nice restaurants and was perfect for what we needed. Trang was very helpful and responsive! Would recommend 😊

We had a fantastic stay here and would recommend this place to anyone looking for a quiet stay in Ha Long. There isn't much to do in the area but if you're looking for something quiet this is the place. The hotel restaurant was brilliant and would definitely recommend. You get a 15% discount too if you mention you are in a condo.
This stay was wonderful! Very relaxing, apartment was clean and comfortable, and the hotels food was amazing. We received discounts for staying in the complex and checking in/out was easy.

اشكر صاحبه السكن اولاً
الشقة بالواقع افضل من الصور وكل شي متوفر بها ولو هناك نجوم اكثر سوف امنحها
انصح الجميع بتجربه السكن جداً مريح وكل شي متوفر به
واتمنى التوفيق للجميع
L’appartement est superbe et correspond vraiment aux photos. Je recommande fortement car l’hôte est également très réactif et nous propose des activités sur la baie d’Ha Long. 🫶🏼
Looks like the photos, she is quick to reply and has good suggestions. Nice views and not far from restaurants. Thank you for having us! ♥️

We loved this apartment, and An A the host was absolutely incredible. She organised a car to take us from Hanoi to Ha Long Bay, gave us many recommendations for restaurants and nice spots in the area, organised the day cruise we took around the bay, answered all our questions about the hotel complex, and checked in on us consistently throughout our stay. When we needed a car to take us to our next stop on our trip, she organised a driver at a much lower price than the price offered by the building’s reception. The apartment itself is very comfortable, with excellent air conditioning, a spacious bathroom, and a working kitchen. The only issue is that the elevators in the building could be unpredictable as the elevator card didn’t seem to work, but when we brought this to her attention, An An assured us it would be fixed for the next guest. Altogether a lovely apartment managed by a fantastic host! Thanks so much!

Alors jai  passer 3 jours dans ce petit appartement tout jolie propre et chaleureux vraiment on s’habitue rapidement il ya tout ce quil faut cest identique au photos trang est juste adorable a l’ecoute et reponds rapidement elle a meme organiser pour moi une  sortie en bateau sue la baie et  ma envoyer un chauffeur qui est venu directement me chercher de l’aeroport ❤️ mille merci a toi je recommande vraiment cet rbnb 🥰

Trang's place is warm, cozy, and quiet.  the bathroom is spacious and the heating lamp is a nice touch when you wake up on a cooler morning. the view was beautiful at night and i look forward to visiting again when the area has more time to develop. that being said i love the location as is for it traffic being very light and allowing one to get around easy. definitely a grat place to stay

Trang is a great host who ensured that our stay was comfortable, there were even some Christmas decorations to make it feel even more homey. The flat itself is beautifully designed, with a fully equipped kitchen and a huge bathroom.
The restaurant downstairs was very nice but a bit pricey and there were limited supermarket options near by so we ended up stocking up in Ha Long Bay City.

beautiful hotel/apartments. great view and delicious restaurant located at lobby floor. trang has been a tremendous help in planning pick ups and drop offs to my destinations. very quick for respond and very accommodating! i was here for one night and had to leave on a cruise the next day. i came back and needed a place to stay and decided to book here again as she made everything very easy for me. even assisting me with an early check in!

I went to Ha Long on a short notice, and was greeted by Trang’s exquisite hospitality and support. The place is beautiful, private, and especially suitable for a getaway trip. Located in a private beach area in Bãi Cháy, everything is within walking distance, and if not, easily accessible via booking an electric cart.
Trang is a very helpful and experienced host. With a few years of hosting under her belt, she has made my booking experience quite pleasant: clear check-in/check-out instructions, diverse recommendations, and quick communications. She made sure that everything was ready upon my arrival, even though my travel itinerary and schedule was a little bit unpredictable.
It’s a 10/10 experience for me, and I’d definitely stay at her place the next time I visit Ha Long.
P/S: the bed might be a little bit too bouncy for my liking, but that’s more of a personal preference

We could not have had a better experience! Anan was amazing, so response, so helpful and simply the most perfect host. The apartment was lovely, and we loved Ha Long Bay! You can pay small additional fees to clean your clothes, swim and have breakfast at the hotel (which the apartment is part of). Anan organised a tour for us on the Bay, would recommend, we got picked up right outside the accommodation. They also organised taxis for us, thanks for the best stay!

Căn hộ tầng cao của bạn An rất sạch sẽ ngăn nắp, ban công half view nhìn ra thành phố và nhìn ra biển rất đẹp khi về đêm. Bạn chủ nhà phản hồi rất nhanh và tạo điều kiện cho khách. Mình rất hài lòng khi ở đây và nhất định sẽ quay lại trong thời gian tới❤️
Nhìn chung phòng sạch, diện tích khiêm tốn phù hợp cho nhà có trẻ con. 2 phòng đều có view đẹp. Host hướng dẫn nhiệt tình, xử lý tình huống nhanh. Sẽ quay lại nếu du lịch Hạ Long

I had a great 3-day stay here! The host was incredibly friendly, responsive, and always helpful. The room was clean, quiet, and very comfortable – perfect for both relaxing and working. All amenities were well-prepared, and the overall setup made me feel at home. The location is convenient, close to the city center and the beach, but still peaceful. I truly appreciated the host’s thoughtfulness and attention to detail. Would definitely come back if I have the chance.
Thank you for the warm hospitality ~~
We only stayed for one night but Minh’s place beyond our expectations. It’s not a big space but has very nice and cozy atmosphere, also the city view is spot on!
Chỗ ở sạch sẽ, view đẹp, chủ nhà hỗ trợ nhiệt tình

Chỗ ở và chủ nhà đều rất tốt, xứng đáng với số tiền bỏ ra, chị chủ nhà cũng hỗ trợ hết mình trong quá trình làm thủ tục nhận phòng và dù có vài sự nhầm lẫn nhưng chị cũng đã giúp và hỗ trợ ngay để bọn mình được nhận phòng nhanh chóng. Mọi người có thể đến trải nghiệm thử nha vì căn hộ cũng vô cùng thoải mái và riêng tư, xứng đáng với số tiền chúng mình đã bỏ ra.

Căn hộ ở vị trí rất thuận tiện, có thể đi bộ ra bờ biển để ngẵm hoàng hôn và pháo hoa tối thứ 3,5,7 view thoáng, xung quanh cũng rất nhiều quán cafe chill. Đầy đủ tiện nghi, hình ảnh trên web giống thực tế. Căn hộ 2 phòng ngủ nhg phòng ngủ bé là 1 giường đơn cho 1ng (đúng mô tả của chủ nhà max 3ng)

This place is amazing for the price! I had a bit of trouble with the check-in location but the host was super patient and nice. The location and view is very beautiful and peaceful. I would recommend this listing to anyone who wants a nice and clean place to stay!

Mai was an attentive and caring host. Well-organized & clean & comfortable apartment, with a great view of the bay. Close to pretty much everything.
Highly recommend :)

Phòng của Huyền rất tuyệt, đầy đủ tiện nghi, vật dụng cho việc giặt giũ lẫn nấu bếp mà không cần mang theo gì. Đồ nội thất sạch sẽ, hiện đại. Rất xứng với giá tiền! Chúng tôi sẽ chọn lưu trú cho lần tới.
Căn hộ siêu đẹp, tầm nhìn ra biển rất đẹp luôn, siêu ưng ý. Các phòng sạch sẽ, thoải mái, nói chung không có gì để chê.
Chủ nhà phản hổi rất nhanh, rất hỗ trợ khách, chỗ ở thoải mái, view phòng nào cũng đẹp hết á
Host thân thiện  nhiệt tình hỗ trợ, nhà sạch đẹp, view cực đỉnh
Host phản hồi nhanh, nhà đẹp, sạch sẽ 🫰🏻

Nous passons deux nuits chez Huyen. L'appartement est très bien équipé et a trois chambres, toutes avec magnifique vue sur la baie, la rivière et le pont Bai Chay.
Huyen était très gentille et réactive.
Nous sommes plus que satisfaits de notre séjour chez Huyen. Je recommande sans hésiter ce logement.
căn hộ sạch sẽ ưng ya

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Amazing 3-Day Getaway in Ha Long Bay!
We had an incredible 3-day stay at this beautiful Airbnb in Ha Long Bay. The location was absolutely perfect—just minutes away from the marina and local restaurants, yet tucked away in a peaceful neighborhood with stunning views of the bay.
The home was clean, comfortable, and exactly as described. We especially loved waking up to the view of the water each morning. The host was incredibly responsive and kind, offering great local tips and even helping us book a day cruise around the limestone islands (which was a highlight of the trip!).
The space had everything we needed—air conditioning, reliable Wi-Fi, hot water, and even a small kitchen for when we wanted to cook. The beds were comfy, and everything felt well cared for.
We highly recommend this place to anyone visiting Ha Long Bay. Whether you’re looking to relax or explore, this Airbnb made the perfect home base. Thank you for a wonderful stay!
I have 1 night stay in Huyen’s villa and it was absolutely a great place. The host was well-communicate and responsive, the villa is nice too
CP值很高
Nice view and decoration

Căn hộ rất sạch sẽ, view biển đẹp. Tôi đã ở vài căn ở khu The Sapphire. Tôi thích căn này nhất.
Bạn chủ nhà phản hồi nhanh. Note: ko có máy giặt trong căn hộ, có thể gọi dịch vụ hỗ trợ của bạn chủ nhà giới thiệu.
em cảm ơn anh host và phòng nghỉ ah. gia đình em rất thoải mái khi nghỉ tại nhà mình ạ. View biển rất đẹp, phòng cách âm tốt, chủ nhà thân thiện, bác quản gia cũng niềm nở... 1 trải nghiệm rất thú vị

Cảm nghĩ nhỏ của tôi về căn hộ mà gia đình 4 người lớn cùng 1 thú cưng đã ở thuê khi du lịch xuống Hạ Long:
Qua app Airbnb, tôi thuê 1 căn hộ tại The Sapphire Residence (thanh toán tiền thuê trước).
Căn hộ (S2. 1809) rất sạch, đẹp, trang nhã, gọn gàng với 2 phòng ngủ lớn/nhỏ cùng 2 phòng tắm tương ứng. Không gian phòng khách, bếp rộng rãi có cả tivi - nhưng tiếc là gia đình chưa thử sử dụng. Căn này có view đẹp hướng biển với con đường ven biển rất đẹp gần như ngay chân toà nhà. Từ ban công của căn hộ với 2 chiếc ghế khum tròn được làm từ chất liệu sắt bọc nhựa chắc chắn và rất thẩm mỹ (giả ghế mây đan), với chiếc bàn tròn nhỏ (cùng chất liệu với đôi ghế) nhưng có thêm mặt kính, mà ngồi thưởng thức ly bia hay cà phê hay ấm trà nhỏ cho cặp đôi/bạn vào buổi sáng hay xế chiều thì rất chilll. Hơi xa một chút là những con tàu biển to, nhỏ chở người, chở hàng chạy qua trước rặng núi và những đảo nhỏ lúc tỏ lúc mờ phía xa.
P. khách (chung khu bếp), p ngủ, p tắm sạch, đẹp. Tóm lại: rất OK
Phòng đẹp, sạch sẽ lắm. Ở gần trung tâm nên di chuyển dễ dàng. Không gian rộng rãi, view đẹp
phòng sạch sẽ, view đẹp, check in nhanh

What a fantastic hotel the host had great communication, the room was sparkling clean and very affordable would definitely stay again on my next trip, highly recommended to anyone travelling ha long bay!
Chủ nhà nhiệt tình hỗ trợ
Decent and nice spot for staying in Ha Long. Plus point for competitively reasonable price!!
Nice place, beautiful room with great view. The Host is so friendly and helpful!
Love the view from balcony.

Phòng ngổn ngang đồ đạc như nhà kho chăn mền có mùi, cần cải thiện về nội thất và chất lượng phòng ốc nhiều hơn. Chủ home phản hồi rất nhanh và xử lí vấn đề tốt. Nếu như chất lượng phòng tốt hơn thì sẽ k coa điển gì chê.

Nhà tầng 18 thoáng mát. Các thiết bị sử dụng tốt. Tôi có em bé nên phải sử dụng bếp thường xuyên để nấu cháo và gia đình hay phải giặt đồ. Chị Hạnh rất chu đáo, nhanh chóng phản hồi và giúp đỡ tận tình.

Bạn chủ nhà phản hồi rất nhanh và supportive. Mình và gđ đi có cả trẻ nhỏ và trưa nắng nên muốn check in sớm bạn cũng hỗ trợ. Nhà cửa sạch sẽ, gọn gàng, đầy đủ tiện nghi, view đẹp, dưới có siêu thị rất tiện lợi. Giá cả quá ok so với chất lượng.

Giá hợp lý. Chỗ đỗ xe oto linh hoạt giá phải chăng 20k/lượt 40k qua đêm.
Home cho khách checkin sớm ngay khi có thể.
Chỗ ở ok. Hơi thiếu đồ nấu bếp. Nhưng không sao. Ổn trong tầm giá

We had a great stay! The apartment is exactly as shown—comfortable and in a tranquil area. It's very close to the beach and right in front of a park with a 2.8 km lake loop, great for walking or running. A market (1.5 km away) offers fresh produce, seafood, and more.
A big plus is having supermarkets, a restaurant, and a café right downstairs, with many more dining options nearby.
One thing to note: while the listing shows pools, a gym, and a playground, these are in the larger complex, not the building itself. The pool and gym require an extra fee and are a short walk away.
Overall, it was a lovely stay, and we’d recommend it for those looking for a peaceful spot with easy access to nature, dining, and convenience!

Es war alles so wie beschrieben und es gibt mehrere Einkaufsmöglichkeiten, Restaurants und Ein Café direkt im Gebäude. Viele Supermärkte und Restaurants sind außerdem direkt um die Ecke. In der Wohmung ist viel Platz und die Betten sind sehr bequem.
Hanh was very helpful the whole time and communicated well. The bnb is very nice highly recommended, Thank you.

View khá đẹp. Vị trí thuận tiện đi lại nhiều điểm vui chơi và mua sắm. Chủ nhà rất nhiệt tình hướng dẫn cho khách về địa điểm ăn chơi mua sắm. Nhà đủ đồ, mình đi chợ về tự nấu thuận tiện. Highly recommend cho một kỳ nghỉ bình yên!

đồ nội thất lúc mới đến có chút trục trặc, tuy nhiên chủ nhà nhanh chóng hỗ trợ .
Chủ nhà thân thiện, thoải mái, tạo điều kiện check out muộn tùy theo tình trạng phòng.
Gia đình có người già, trẻ nhỏ sinh hoạt có cảm giác như ở nhà.
Phòng rất tốt, view đẹp. Có thể do tôi tới vào mùa thấp điểm nên yên tĩnh. Chủ nhà chủ động nhanh chóng. Nội thất tiện nghi, sạch sẽ. Rất thích hợp cho gia đình 4 người.
Bạn chủ nhiệt tình. Phòng sạch sẽ, đầy đủ máy giặt, đồ bếp. Có quán ăn, cafe, siêu thị ở tầng 1. Hình ảnh chụp phòng chưa được cập nhật mới nhất nhưng mọi thứ ok.

Our stay was good. Halong bay town was a bit disappointing but the boat tour that Hahn recommended was great. The food on the boat was delicious. The Airbnb was located well and there was a really good Bahn mi place across the street. Hahn would answer all our questions right away. Showers had a nice water pressure.

I like Hanh's house very much. It is clean and has a view of the sea. It's close to the market and you can cook your own food. We also love our host Hanh, who is warm, friendly and patient. Ask her a lot of questions and she gives great answers. She also helped us book a boat to Halong Bay, which was a great experience. We will book her house again next time we come to Ha Long.

Hanh is a great host. She helped us with a tour of the bay and a ride back to Ha Noi. Her place is clean and comfortable and felt like home. There is lots of small shops and restaurants in the area and you can get a taxi to take you to other areas without any problems. Would recommend any of her places.

Căn hộ sạch sẽ, khuôn viên yên tĩnh và gần bãi biển.  Căn hộ nằm trong khuôn viên khu dân cư nên nếu các bạn đi bộ quanh khu sẽ tìm thấy các hàng quán ăn của dân cư nên về chất lượng đồ ăn là ngon và giá cả dành cho người dân sinh sống nên không đắt. Nhà mình đã ăn thử 1 nhà anh chị có bún hải sản và phở gà ta, mọi thứ đều chất lượng. Nếu các bạn tìm chỗ ăn sáng, ăn khuya có thể đi bộ để thấy mà không mất công lên xe đi vào khu ăn uống đông đúc.

Hanh place was good! We almost got everything we need and Hanh also very responsive. She helps us a lot during our stay starting from our transportation until our and she also makes sure our way to get back to Hanoi is comfortable. Recommended!
Kim is very responsive. She accommodated all of our requests and answered all of our questions. The place is spacious and very quiet. This place is highly recommended. 😍
잘 정비된 주거단지안에 있는 아파트로서 쾌적한 주변환경과 밤에도 조용해서 숙면하기에 도움이 되었습니다. 가까운 거리의 편의시설들은 산책시에 또다른 즐거움이 되었습니다. 호스트의 친절한 안내 또한 감사했습니다.
It was a great place for a very affordable price. miss Hanh was also responsive and helpful. Will surely book this place again when I get the cahnce to have another visit.
Super Unterkunft und hilfsbereit vermieterin👍🏻
place is great and we will be staying there again in a few days!  Only issue was only 1 cup so my kids,  wife and I drank out of bowls...... we aren't cats!
This is a beautiful room with magnificent sea view, and the host is responsible! It made my stay wonderful! Thank you
숙소가 고층에 있어 뷰가 너무 좋았습니다 바로 밑에 마트가 있어 편리했어요

Homestay của Mrs Nhi nằm trong khu dân cư yên tĩnh, sang trọng. Có bãi đỗ xe ngày đêm và gần các tiện ích cần thiết. Căn hộ rất sạch sẽ và sang trọng, bày trí đẹp mắt. Chủ nhà rất hiếu khách, luôn phản hồi khi tôi cần thêm hướng dẫn. Tôi rất hài lòng và chắc chắn sẽ quay lại trong chuyến thăm Hạ Long sắp tới!

Căn hộ sạch đẹp, ngăn nắp, đồ dùng thơm mới tinh tươm. View đẹp, mở cửa ban công gió biển mát rượi. Chỉ tối ngủ mình mới cần dùng đến điều hoà. Mình thích gió mát tự nhiên ở đây.
Các tiện ích đầy đủ quanh toà nhà. Đi bộ ra chợ Hạ Long 2 mua rất tiện. Trải nghiệm cà phê gầm cầm thú zị. Quán bún sườn cạnh toà nhà cũng rất ngon. Tiệm giặt là đối diện sảnh A, rất nhanh và thơm tho.
Chủ nhà siêu dễ thương. Chỉ dẫn tận tình. Chắc chắn có cơ hội mình sẽ quay lại nếu có dịp đi Hạ Long nữa. 🫶
Phòng sạch sẽ, ngay trung tâm tiện đi lại. Chủ nhà thân thiện
Nice apartment with two bedrooms and a nice view. The price is also much cheaper than booking directly with the hotel. I would recommend.
best budget place to be in

Phòng cực kỳ sạch sẽ, trang trí đẹp mắt và đầy đủ tiện nghi – đúng như mô tả. Mình đặc biệt ấn tượng với sự gọn gàng và cảm giác ấm cúng khi bước vào. Vị trí thuận tiện, dễ dàng di chuyển đến trung tâm Hạ Long và các điểm vui chơi xung quanh. Chủ nhà siêu dễ thương, hỗ trợ nhanh chóng và rất chu đáo. Một lựa chọn tuyệt vời cho chuyến đi nghỉ dưỡng thoải mái! 😊

Mình đã có một kỳ nghỉ rất dễ chịu tại căn hộ Sapphire S2. Căn hộ sạch sẽ, đúng như mô tả, có đủ tiện nghi cho sinh hoạt hằng ngày, đặc biệt là 2 phòng ngủ riêng nên rất phù hợp nếu đi theo nhóm hoặc gia đình. Không gian yên tĩnh, có thang máy và bãi gửi xe nên di chuyển cũng rất thuận tiện.
Chủ nhà thân thiện, phản hồi nhanh và hỗ trợ rất nhiệt tình. Mình thấy rất hài lòng với trải nghiệm lần này và chắc chắn sẽ quay lại nếu có dịp. Cảm ơn bạn nhiều! 😍😍

Đức Minh là 1 chủ nhà tuyệt với, đón tiếp và hướng dẫn khách vô cùng nhiệt tình, chu đáo, cẩn thận
Mặc dù có 1 chút trực trặc nhỏ về tivi nhưng đã giải quyết rất nhanh
Căn hộ giống như ảnh
Vị trí thuận lợi, trang thiết bị trong nhà đầy đủ.
Phòng sạch sẽ, đủ đồ dùng cơ bản, có cả bộ kit sơ cứu. Giá cả hợp lý, anh chị chủ nhiệt tình hỗ trợ, phản hồi tin nhắn nhanh.
Phòng sạch sẽ, gọn gàng, đầy đủ đồ dùng thiết yếu. Giá cả hợp lý. Chủ nhà thân thiện, nhiệt tình ạ!
Chỗ ở rộng rãi sạch sẽ, chủ nhà thân thiện hỗ trợ nhiệt tình, sẽ quay lại lần sau.
Anh chị chủ nhà rất nhiệt tình chu đáo, trả lời tin nhắn rất nhanh
chủ nhà thân thiện, nhiệt tình. phòng ở sạch sẽ phù hợp giá tiền
nhà đẹp sạch sẽ, chú nhà nhiệt tình chu đáo
phòng sạch sẽ, thơm tho. chủ nhà cũng rất nhiệt tình
