Eine wirklich sehr sehr schöne Wohnung. Außerdem war die Kommunikation super, alles sehr sauber und gemütlich und die Wohnung hat viele Annehmlichkeiten, wie z.B. eine Waschmaschine. Es war nur etwas schwer für uns hinzufinden, da es keine genaue Beschreibung gibt, der Taxifahrer uns beim falschen Gebäude aussteigen lies und man mit der Adresse nicht zum exakten Gebäude kommt. Nachdem wir mehrere fragten, fanden wir die tolle Unterkunft aber doch.
pleasant stay with a friendly, responsive host. would stay again!
Goed waar voor je geld! Communicatie was ook erg goed! Airco was niet zo snel met verkoelen, maar hij doet het wel.
Great place, with great views. All nice and clean :)
Nơi ở rất sạch sẽ và dễ tìm. Host support rất rất nhiệt tình ạ ^^
Một nơi đáng để ở lại ngắn ngày, nếu về lâu dài thì cần thêm tiện ích khác
Lovely and cozy place. Recommended !
A lovely apartment. Although there is no fridge or iron, it’s a nice place to stay in a few days.

Phòng ngủ và phòng khách view cầu Bãi Cháy và Sun wheel cả ban ngày và tối rất đẹp. Từ Sapphire có thể đi bộ ra xem pháo hoa tối thứ 3,5,7 view thoáng đẹp. Căn hộ thoải mái cho 4ng lớn và đầy đủ tiện nghi
Chủ nhà nhiệt tình, phòng sạch sẽ, tiện nghi. Sẽ quay lại lần sau.

Host was extremely helpful and responsive, however, fridge is broken and turns off. Kettle did not work at first however, he did replace this. There was no cutlery or microwave other than that, the property was reasonably priced and host was lovely.
Rất tiện cho việc di chuyển ăn uống vui chơi
We realky had a great stay. Responsive, kind and friendly host. Superb!! Thanks Nam. If Ill be back here in Vietnam esp in Ha long I will surebook here again!!

it is in the part of the city where the local lives. Near to seaside, there are new cafes/ restaurants in walking distance. It is very close to bridge which connects two sides of the city. And, the apartment has all basic necessities.

Tổng quan 3/5
Ảnh thật, thực tế đúng với hình
Nhà đẹp, giá hợp lý
Nhà tắm hơi bất tiện vì thông phòng, bếp chưa đạt được điều kiện cơ bản (tủ lạnh ko lạnh, siêu nước hỏng ...)
Mô tả chưa chính xác về bể bơi và chỗ gửi xe (thực tế: bể bơi 300k/lượt, gửi xe 80k/đêm)
Super Lage, schöne Aussicht, tolle Möglichkeiten seine Zeit zu genießen. Empfehlenswert!

Das Appartement ist im 25. Stock eines Hotels. Fahrstuhl vorhanden. Toller Ausblick auf die Bucht und die Brücke. Schön hell. Gute AC mit Heizung. Viel Platz durch das Wohnzimmer. Gute Abstellmöglichkeiten für Koffer. Küche haben wir nicht genutzt. Abholung mit Taxi funktioniert gut. Kaum Restaurants in der Nähe. Vermieter ist sehr freundlich und organisiert zB auch Scooterverleih. Die Wohnung ist sauber. Die Bettwäsche und Handtücher waren jedoch zerknittert und hatten Flecken. Alles in allem super für ein paar Tage.

I can highly recommend this place if you stay in Ha Long for a couple of nights. Nam is an awesome host and even helped us buying tickets for the water park. Please drop by and see experience his luxurious apartment on the 25th floor for yourself.
View đẹp, phòng sạch sẽ
nice place with good location
ok nhé mng
Sạch, đẹp, thuận tiện. Không bị ồn ào, có đủ tiện ghi. Chủ nhà nhiệt tình
Super hostitel. Rychle reagoval a vzdy se vším pomohl. Ubytování jsme si užili
Host phản hồi nhanh, hỗ trợ đổi ngày và check in sớm mặc dù mh não cá vàng đến nơi rồi mới biết bị đặt ngày sai :)))) Phòng vị trí đẹp, sạch sẽ, gọn gàng, cả nhà ai cũng ưng.
Anh Hà phản hồi nhanh, luôn chủ động hỗ trợ người thuê nhà. Căn hộ sạch sẽ, ngăn nắp gần các vị trí đi lại và có view cực đẹp hướng ra vịnh
Chủ nhà rất nhiệt tình, hỗ trợ khách mọi lúc, chỗ ở sạch sẽ, view nhìn ra bãi biển đẹp.
We had a great stay in Ha Long. The place is great, clean and modern. Beautiful views of the bay, near shop and restaurants and only a short taxi ride to the beach. Highly recommended
Phòng có view rất tuyệt, sạch sẽ, tiện nghi, anh Hà rất chuyên nghiệp và hướng dẫn nhiệt tình.

The space was adequate for our needs. It is cozy and attractive outside; you can see the lights from the small balcony, yet it is refreshing to have a cup of coffee. The toilet and bathroom are really clean. Overall, we enjoyed staying at his property and will definitely return.
Great View. Supportive hosy. Easy to access the accommodations

房东非常热情，非常负责的帮我们约了包车，给我们解决了一个大麻烦
房子非常新，在酒店里面，配套和服务都非常好
下次来下龙还是会优先考虑这里
Very clean and tidy,  Superb view to the ocean from living room & logia. Worth every pennies spent. Highly recommend!

I stayed there for 2 nights. The apartment was clean and cozy, the bedroom had a beautiful sea view from above. The communication with Hang was also awesome, she always replied quickly. There is only one thing to consider before booking  is the location. It located a few km away from Bai Chay beach and more than 10km from Quang Ninh centre. So don’t expect to go there by foots but it will not be a problem if you rent a motorbike. Finally I would say it worths the money.

This is one of the best places in the world. Among 100s of airbnbs we've visited this one is the best one we would definitely come back soon. After spending a month here we even started thinking to move to Vietnam forever. Apartment itself has a great view, everything is just working and super comfortable. I rarely write such a great review to a place. but this one is a real gem. High floor, nice place to walk, responsive and helping host. I just can't imagine what else I'd need

So, 2608 and 2607: if available - book immediately.

The comfort there is truly unmatched in this price bracket !
The internet is stable and fiber fast!
From the cozy beds to the soft seating, these are designed for a long stay.
It felt like a home away from home - usually this level of comfort cost 3 times more, while in Europe I pay 5 times more for similar level of leisure.
This is stunning place. Great location!
Walks, shop, transport - everything is super convenient.
The host is super responsive.
Perfect stay for 2 weeks!

Dear Hang. Thank you so much. This is one of my best stays in an apartment that really felt like my own home. If you have plans of Visiting Halong Bay, please stay at Hang's place. Value for money, restuarants nearby, good sight of the city and overall excellent Host. I would come back again in the future. Thank you so much.
We spent three wonderful weeks here! Cute apartment with great view on Ha Long bay
One of the best experiences, Mrs. Hang is wonderful host she was friendly and helpful. Beautiful place I couldn't asked for anything more. I will definitely recommend this place.
Căn hộ của hằng thật hoàn hảo. Quang cảnh thật ngoạn mục , và nơi này không tì vết với tất cả các tiện nghi bạn cần. Điều thực sự nổi bật là lòng hiếu khách đặc biệt của Hằng . Rất khiên dùng!
Convenient plaee nice building.  store and small restaurant in the place.would stay again
Great apartment with amenities and a lovely view of the sea. excellent value for money. Walking distance to Bai chay beach and close by restaurants / shops etc.

Hangs place was fine for a couple of nights. Anymore and the shops downstairs would not have been enough for fresh foods like bread, butter, milk etc. We ate out mostly as only stayed for a few days.
The checking in was terrible, as we had real problems with the keyhole the host gave us, they had to eventually let us in by putting the code in remotely, not good!
We then had to use the key card, but even that we had problems with, as it kept being temperamental. However, we jjust left it whilst we went out and the next time we came back, it was okay and let us in.
The day of check out (friday 29th dec) there was drilling in the morning from the next door, which started about 7ish, not good if you had, had a late night before. Would of been nice for the host to have told us this would be happening.
The shower water was not very warm on the Friday morning of check out and we could not get the water in the kitchen sink to go warm at all, so therefore had to wash pots up in cold water!!!!!!
Bạn có thể nhìn thấy biển , toàn cảnh vịnh Hạ Long ngay trước mắt , căn hộ mới sạch đẹp , chủ nhà thân thiện, một nơi tốt đẹp để ở , nhất định sẽ quay trở lại.
Very nice and attentive host. I can highly recommend and will come again next time.

Très bon service.
Appartement conforme aux photos.
J aurais mis un 5 étoiles si la cuisine avait été mieux équipée et la salle de bain + propre.
Super pobyt :) blisko plaża i wyspa z której odpływają promy na Cat Ba. W mieści dużo restauracji. Piękne widoki z okna

This is a great little apartment with wonderful views. It was quiet, well laid out and there is secure (paid) scooter parking. Not a great deal going on in the location but we were there at Tet when everything was closed which had no small part to do with nobody being around. The host was always very quick and helpful in his response(s). Cheap and quick Grab to the start of the Ha Long Bay cruise.
Nhà ở rất tuyệt, giống như trong ảnh, sạch sẽ và ngăn nắp, không có gì để chê cả

Hãng’s place is really nice, the view to the beautiful Ha Long Bay is amazing 🥰
The apartment have everything to feel home. Kitchen, big fridge, AC, hot water, nice shower, washing machine, TV…
The area is peaceful and nice, you have few restaurants around, gym, pool, supermarket few minutes walking and stores on the same building with a bit of everything.
The port to take the cruise was just few minutes away by grab.
Hâng was friendly and super helpful all the time. She is a really nice host.
100% recommended ❤️

With stayed 4 weeks. Clean and new, nice view, A/C quiet and efficient, nice kitchen, hot water, fresh market in the back of the street opened daily (affordable) and K-market is really good to find importations. Bed is hard, but they supply extra blankets if you ask for it. Really good internet. Quiet and safe area with families and children. You can use 'Grab' for taxi, they are usually more affordable. The manager of the place is super friendly and return messages really fast. We recommend it!

Lovely apartment with good views. Great host very responsive and helpful.
Few restaurants near the apartment but amenities available from mini mart downstairs. Approximately 10mins drive from port where the cruises depart from.

My stay at this apartment was absolutely incredible. The location was unbeatable, offering mesmerizing views of Ha Long Bay that made every moment memorable.
The apartment itself was impeccably clean, comfortable, and beautifully designed. Every amenity I needed was provided, ensuring a relaxing stay. The host was incredibly accommodating and easily contactable .
I highly recommend this apartment to anyone seeking a break with a view that’s simply unparalleled. Five stars, without a doubt!”
View was very nice
Prachtig appartement met een heel mooi uitzicht.
very nice place :)
海景高層單間公寓，乾淨舒適，房東人很好。公寓內除了洗手盆下水有點慢，其它一切都很好。
Very friendly helpful host. Quick response to any queries. Apartment very clean. Would use again without hesitation.
appartement très agréable et hote réactif
Great aâprtment!

Giá phòng rẻ nhất khu vực rồi.  Chủ phòng thân thiện, hỗ trợ nhiệt tình để nhận nhà nhanh chóng. Nhà sạch sẽ, thơm tho, tiện nghi đầy đủ, chiếc view siêu đỉnh toàn cầu Bãi Cháy. Ở đây là rẻ nhất rồi khỏi phải mất công check mn nhé
Đầy đủ tiện nghi, view đẹp, chủ home nhiệt tình. Vị trí thuận tiện cho lịch trình của tôi.
Phòng đẹp gọn gàng sạch sẽ mà view phòng nào cũng đẹp điênnnn huhuu🥹🥹 chắc chắn sẽ qlai ạ💖 chủ nhà thân thiện hỗ trợ nhiệt tình

Gia đình tôi cùng bạn bè đã có trải nghiệm rất xứng đáng tại đây, giá thành vô cùng hợp lý cho căn hộ 3 ngủ. Vị trí của chung cư cũng rất tiện lợi với lịch trình du lịch của chúng tôi, gần các hàng bia nổi tiếng, gần trung tâm Hòn Gai, bên dưới chân chung cư có cửa hàng tiện lợi đầy đủ đồ cần thiết. Đồ đạc trong căn hộ gần như mới, không hề có mùi tẩy rửa hay ẩm mốc, chăn gối cũng rất sạch, chủ nhà có thêm chăn dự phòng, bếp ga nấu lẩu, đồ bếp cũng rất đầy đủ và sạch sẽ, tuy nhiên bếp từ lại chưa đấu điện và chưa sử dụng được. Vị trí căn hộ có cửa sổ nhìn thẳng ra cầu Bãi Cháy, rất đẹp và xứng đáng. Bạn Hưng rất nhiệt tình và phản hồi nhanh với những thắc mắc của tôi, bạn ấy cũng chuẩn bị sẵn cho gia đình tôi 1 giỏ quà welcome bao gồm đồ ăn vặt, cà phê và trà.
Chúng tôi chắc chắn sẽ quay lại nếu có dịp đến thăm Hạ Long lần nữa.
Căn hộ sạch sẽ, tiện nghi, view cầu bãi cháy siêu siêu đẹp. Host nhiệt tình 100 đỉm 😍😍
Mọi thứ đều ok, bạn chủ nhiệt tình
Host nhiệt tình.
awesome place to stay
整體上都很滿意！
Beautiful view of Halong

We really enjoyed our stay here. The apartment is exactly as pictured.
Having a drink on the balcony in the evening and watching the sunset was magical.
The area itself is really great, it feels like it was build yesterday, lots of great cafe's and restaurants. Wide roads with very little traffic, an absolutely pleasure to walk around and explore.
Would stay here again.

Our family arrived early, but thankfully the host let us checked in early. It was confused for us to call grab and even couple of the grab driver dropped us off at the wrong building- To easy call grab i recommend enter “The Sapphire’ follow the address and should be build 1 - must enter the sapphire- the place is a little out dated but other than that the location is great- The host is very responsive. One more thing, you can not see the firework show from the balcony, must walk out of the building for 5 minutes.
phòng ốc sạch sẽ. chủ nhà nhiệt tình. sẽ quay lại nếu có điều kiện

Mr Thuy was very friendly and welcoming, even let us check in early and dropped off some Banh Mi's. Very close to the water with a great view. Being able to do laundry in the middle of our trip was a huge help! Provided a lot of information to make check in very easy. Also helped arrange a driver to the airport in Hanoi which was greatly appreciated.
Home rất phù hợp cho gia đình hoặc các bạn đi du lịch nhóm. Điểm 10 về ngăn nắp ☺️.
Great view of the city and the bay. Host was incredibly welcoming and communicative- arranged a taxi for us the next morning and checked in with us constantly to make sure we were okay.

Our stay here was wonderful!! The host was so helpful, and offered us many recommendations for the area. They even helped us book a day cruise around the bay, on the busy holiday! I would definitely recommend staying here, and would stay again if I ever came back to Ha Long!
Mr. Thuy's place was perfect for our family. Very clean, lots of amenities, and the view outside is beautiful! Mr. Thuy is highly professional and accomodated very well. Highly recommend this place!
Nhà sạch sẽ , dễ tìm chủ nhà thân thiện
Căn hộ thuận tiện đi lại, view đẹp, xunh quanh nhiều quán cf đẹp và nhậu ngon. Phòng ốc sạch sẽ yên tĩnh an toàn… ưng cái bụng
nếu tiếp tục đi Hạ Long tôi sẽ lại lựa chọn căn hộ này. xinh xắn, gọn gàng, view cũng đẹp nữa.
Chủ nhà thân thiện và hướng dẫn tận tình. Phòng ở vị trí tốt, gần biển, có thể đi bộ ra biển. Nhà sạch sẽ, tiện nghi, điều hoà kêu hơi to một chút
Convenient apartment, near the beach. Nice support from the host. Suitable for families to stay and travel
It was a great place to stay, clean, spacious and had an amazing view,  the host was also very friendly and knowledgeable. would definitely recommend

Place was nice and clean, there was all the amenities we needed as well from hair dryer to towels and mineral water
Host is also extremely friendly and on the ball. He helped us with anything and everything we needed.
Really appreciate it!! Even helped with guiding us to book tours and also sleeper bus to our next city
Thank you Thuy!!!

Căn hộ nằm ở vị trí trung tâm, bao quanh bởi nhiều nhà hàng quán cafe và điểm mua sắm, thuận tiện cho việc di chuyển đến các địa điểm du lịch. Không gian xung quanh yên tĩnh phù hợp cho việc nghỉ ngơi. Tiện nghi trong nhà đầy đủ và rất sạch sẽ ngăn nắp. Chủ nhà phản hồi nhanh, rất nhiệt tình và lịch sự, chủ động hỏi thăm chúng tôi về thời gian check in, cũng như sẵn lòng hỗ trợ chúng tôi nhận phòng sớm.

Wonderful flat in the heart of Ha Long city. The owner was one of the best I have ever had and helped us out with everything.
Would definitely recommend and come again!
Great location, responsive and helpful host. Apartment just as described, clean and a great view

Notre séjour en famille c’est très bien passé. L’hôte était très accueillant et nous avions même une petite surprise avec de jolies porte-clés en arrivant. Endroit calme, jolie vue, nous recommandons sans hésiter !

Amazing, will visit again.
We had 2 big dogs (Labs), but the host was very accommodating and helpful. Had a wonderful stay and will strongly recommend to everyone.

I had an incredible stay at this Airbnb! The two-bedroom unit was spacious, clean, and offered a breathtaking view of Halong Bay that I couldn’t get enough of. The host went above and beyond to make our stay memorable, even surprising us with delicious Banh Mi as a thoughtful thank-you gift.
Everything about this place exceeded my expectations—from the comfortable accommodations to the excellent value for the price. I am beyond satisfied and will definitely book again on my next visit to Halong Bay. Highly recommended!

Had to book a quick last minute stay after half my Ha Long Bay cruise was cancelled due to weather. So aside from one night I didn’t get to do much but it was a great chance to enjoy the great view and do some quick laundry. As a location, it’s tough for me to say as it’s the off season this area is on the other side of the bridge from the main tourist spots. Nothing a grab taxi didn’t fix but it was very quiet in the neighborhood that I’m sure gets busy during high season. Great stay! Bed’s extra firm but didn’t bother me.

Great place and wonderful view from the apartment. Clean and spacious. The host was responsive and attentive. The only downfall was the bed, too hard in my opinion. But still a great space for our stay in Halong Bay

The place very beautiful with sea view and city view. Very near to cruise bay area like 10mins to 15mins only. The house very clean and beautiful. Host, he very friendly and helpful. Keep on checking with us is that everything okay or no. Highly recommended to stay there. Thank you.

phòng xinh lắm lun, hợp vibe cozy của mình. Chỗ ở sạch sẽ, tiện nghi, tinh tế, view nhìn ra sun wheel cũng rất đẹp. Chị host take care tốt và rất nicee, nói chung là 10₫. Mỗi tội hơi bùn vì bể bơi ko đc free hehe

Phòng rất chill và phù hợp với các bạn đi couple hoặc nhóm 3,4 đều được. Chị chủ siêu nice sẽ hướng dẫn các bạn tận tình và vô cùng chuyên nghiệp dù không hề làm phiền các bạn quá nhiều, các bạn có không gian riêng để tận hưởng kì nghỉ và kể cả thời tiết bên ngoài có như nào, bạn cũng có thể quay lại căn phòng tuyệt vời này. Nằm trong phòng, thư giãn và đọc những cuốn sách siêu hay của chị chủ (bật mí còn note của chị ấy trong sách nữa nha 🤣) , siêu thú vị. Các bạn cũng có thể chơi game uống rượu và trả lời các câu hỏi trong bộ bài cho couple (có sẵn nghen). Một trải nghiệm tuyệt vời, nếu có cơ hội hãy ghé ngang đó và tận hưởng một Hạ Long vừa nhộn nhịp vừa yên bình nhưng cũng rất hiện đại và văn minh nha 🤗🤗❤️❤️
Căn hộ tuyệt vời để lưu trú khi đến với Hạ Long :)
Căn hộ sạch đẹp yên tĩnh và đáng để ở
非常好的地段，非常新的房子，非常好的装修，非常全的设施
Beautiful apartment at the prime location of the city. Great host!
Great value for money, better than pictures.

Trang là 1 chủ nhà siêu tuyệt vời, bạn ấy hướng dẫn tận tình, tỉ mỉ và dễ hiểu. Bạn ấy còn hỗ trợ gia đình mình checkin sớm hơn, dễ mến lắm luôn
Nhà đúng như mô tả, sạch sẽ, ngăn nắp và cảm giác thực sự như ở nhà
Chủ nhà 5*, nhà 5* về dịch vụ.
Căn hộ khách sạn 5 sao rất mới và tiện nghi. Host rất nhiệt tình và chu đáo. Nhất định sẽ sớm quay lại.

We had a great stay at Trangs place, everything was clean and mostly quiet.
if something came up Trang reacted very fast and handled it like a pro.
Great local recommendations. Can absolutely vouch for this place.
WiFi is great too, working can be easily done.
The apartment was clean, the view from the balcony was nice. This place is definitely worth the price.
What an absolutely beautiful apartment! the host was incredibly helpful and so kind. I would love to stay here again in the future and would recommend it to anyone!

Very nice apartment in a former five star hotel.
Great view.
Lots to do at a walking distance.
Great host.

I am giving this place five stars, but the host does need to work on the overall cleanliness of the place.  That said, it is very affordable for the size of the apartment and its prime location.  It also has a nice view and is very new/modern feeling with plenty of storage.
非常棒的住宿体验！我推荐大家选择这里。
位置挺好的 旁边有海边的咖啡店 往里走还有吃饭的 还不错 环境也好
Nice host. Great apartment with comfortable bed and very good shower. An excellent choice when staying in Ha Long city
شقة رائعة مميزة مكان هادئ مستضيف متعاون ومرن سريع الرد والاستجابة
Perfect!
Phòng nằm trong toà mới hoàn thiện, thang máy cac thu lúc mình đi còn ch xé siu 😇. Ph ốc sạch sẽ nha. Anh chủ nhà nhiệt tình. Đáng trải nghiệm
Tôi đã có khoảng thời gian tuyệt vời khi lưu trú tại đây vì nó rất gần bãi biển
Good

Nhà siêu mới và siêu sạch. Gửi xe bên ngoài free còn xuống hầm ban ngày là 20k/ lượt ban đêm 40k/ lượt quá rẻ. Chủ nhà nhiệt tình ghê luôn. Giá quá rẻ so với home luôn á, đồ muji từ cái chai refill đến cái cốc luôn. Mê
Chị chủ rất tuyệt voi,rất thân thiện luon giúp đở khi cần,cảm giác như ở nhà, phòng rất sạch sẽ và mới,cảm ơn chị chủ rất nhiều,hen gặp lại

our host was so cute and helpful. there are also a lot of cafes and small vendors around for breakfast and dinner. the walk to the closet beach was only 15 minutes. it was easy to catch a taxi and only 10 minutes away by taxi to go to the clubs. just be mindful not to fall for the security guy's trick. he asked to watch our luggage and charged us 3 usd for 10 minutes without telling us beforehand. all in all, everything is so worth it, gotta stay at her home again hihi
The room is really clean especially the bathroom and very well equipped. The living room & bedroom has a nice view. Id definitely come back! Hoa is very nice and always responded quickly.
Cửa sổ có tầm nhìn đẹp. Chủ nhà giúp đỡ nhiệt tình
Dịch vụ tốt, sẽ quay lại
Chị host thân thiện, dễ thương lắm, support hết mình nếu như có vấn đề gì. Phòng design đẹp. Ncl ổn sẽ quay lại nếu có cơ hội

Phòng rộng rãi, view đẹp, chị host rất nhiệt tình.
Siêu ưng!
Phòng đẹp, sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi. Chị chủ thân thiện, nhiệt tình. Sẽ quay lại

Most beautiful and comfortable room we stayed at in Vietnam - and we’ve been traveling around for a month. Great value for money. A little supermarket and a couple of cafes nearby, and the host arranged scooter hire which was handy.

Zum ersten Mal war ich in Ha Long und habe diese Unterkunft für meine Frau und mich gebucht. Die Aussicht auf die Stadt und das Meer war einfach traumhaft! Sollte ich wieder nach Ha Long kommen, werde ich diese Unterkunft ohne Zweifel erneut buchen. Die Gastgeberin war sehr herzlich, hilfsbereit und hat schnell auf unsere Nachrichten reagiert...

This was by far our favorite apartment in Vietnam. It was fully stocked with everything we needed, extremely comfortable, and extremely clean. It looked exactly like the photos. The host was very friendly and accommodating as well. Definitely book this apartment if it’s available. You won’t regret it.

Wir haben drei schöne Tage in Thi Yens Appartement verbracht. Schon im Vorfeld meldete sie sich bei uns mit Informationen zum Check-In und bat uns ihre Hilfe an. Insgesamt war Thi Yen immer ansprechbar und meldete sich bei Problemen super schnell zurück. Das Appartement ist sehr modern ausgestattet mit allem was man benötigt und es war sehr sauber. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Toll ist auch, dass man die Waschmaschine nutzen kann. In der Umgebung gibt es einige Cafés und Restaurants und mit dem Grab ist man auch schnell direkt in Ha Long, wenn man etwas mehr Trubel möchte. Nachts ist es sehr ruhig in der Wohnung und der Ausblick vom Balkon aus ist super.

We were very well received by the host, she was very hospitable and attentive to every little thing. We felt very comfortable as soon as we arrived at the apartment. It was clean and smelled good in every corner of the apartment. The kitchen was well-equipped and the bathroom was everything a traveler needs after a tiring road trip.
The bed was very comfortable and the balcony had a great view at sunrise and sunset, combining the sea with one of the seven wonders of the world.
We just didn't know that the pool and jacuzzi were a seperate ticket, But the price was very reasonable.
We enjoyed the city very much and wish we could have stayed longer, next time we will definitely not change the place and the duration will be longer.
We would like to thank the host very much and recommend anyone to book with her without any doubt in the smallest details, because everything that is in the pictures we found in reality.
A great condo . Almost brand new,  with all the amenities.  A beautiful building with an ocean view .I recommend this to everyone . Ten out of ten .
Alloggio con vista impagabile sul mare, l’host è sempre disponibile, scomoda la zona se non si affitta uno scooter. Consiglio comunque l’alloggio.

What an awesome place to stay! It was modern, spacious and immaculately clean.Our host was so friendly and kind. Very responsive and occasionally reaching out to see if we needed anything.The roof top infinity pool amazing as well as the restaurants on the first floor. I would absolutely stay here again when I return to Halong.
Quá tuyệt trong tầm giá. Giá này thì không đòi hỏi nhiều nhưng phòng ốc rất sạch, chủ nhà cực kỳ nhiệt tình. 10/10

The place was great and the host was very responsive and helpful. The pool is an additional cost and the beach 300m away is really just shoreline but no beach. However, still a very nice place and would recommend.

I really liked the accommodation! The internet speed was important to me and the hostess let me check the internet before booking the accommodation (the speed was excellent), the accommodation itself was wonderful, included water and cleaning twice a week. It is a bit far from the center, but the city is small and for me it was not a problem. Thank you very much for your hospitality!
Chủ nhà vô cùng thân thiện và mến khách. Phòng giống như mô tả với nhiều tiện ích hiện đại

Our short stay was very comfortable. AC works well, fan was a lovely addition, couch was amazing and we loved having the TV with Netflix. People in the building respected quiet hours. Tons of extra linens which we appreciated. We loved having our own washer and space outside to hang our clothes. There is a coffee shop and mini mart at the bottom floor of the building for convenience. This is a very modern apartment, which is very welcomed after spending a few weeks in rural Vietnam.
Linh was always responsive and helpful! She treated us very well, and we felt so welcome. Thank you so much! 😍
Linh's place is really cozy, Linh is super responsive and helpful. Overall highly recommend
Phòng ở sạch sẽ ! Chủ nhà thân thiện !
Best place to rent in the city. Amazing, definitely recommend it. Host is super friendly and communicative. Also we forgot some stuff and they delivered it to us. Many thanks 🙏

Nous avons passé un bon séjour dans cet appartement avec vue sur mer, sur le pont et le téléphérique, grandiose. Il est situé pas loin de restaurants et à 10 minutes en moto de centre commercial et d’une belle vue sur la baie de Halong. Le logement était grand, propre et avait tout ce dont on a besoin. L’hôte était très accueillante et réactive et nous a beaucoup aidé.

Linh was very helpful and responsive to all our concerns and needs. She was able to help us book a motorbike for two days, even though we were only there for a short period. She even helped us book a private transfer from her condo to Cat Bi Airport, as we were traveling to Da Nang after our last day in Ha Long. To the condo, it was all modern and beautiful. It has all the amenities that was listed on the airbnb app. It was spotless, clean and very classy place. It has wide spaces and facing with a beautiful view of the Ha Long Beach and the bridge. The place is located 14 mins to the Ha Long International Cruise port where you can have your full day or hall day tour to Ha Long Bay, Ti Top Island, Sun Sot Cave and etc( P.S. depends on your package tour😉). The Sun World Ha Long where the Amusement Park, Cable Car and Ocean Park are is only 16 mins.away both are by motorbike😉. All in all me and my partner had a good,quite and beautiful experience with Linh Home abode which I highly rec
The place is nice and beautiful. The host is very helpful and prompt to help us. Only a small note is that you can hear the neighbors bathroom during the night.

5 stars stay! We loved our 4-weeks stay. The apartment is very spacious, comfortable and modern. The entire space is very clean and the bed is super comfortable to sleep. The kitchen is well equipped to cook your own food, there was even oil, salt, sugar etc., while the kitchen utensils are more than enough. On the balcony there is a washing machine, making easy to do laundry when you need. There was also available drinkable water, which was very nice.
Communicating with the host was very easy from the beginning and also during our stay.
The location is also nice, since you can see the cable car and Ha Long Wheel, but also you can reach almost every site in the city in a couple of minutes.
If you want to enjoy a place where to feel like home in Ha Long City, this may be a great choice.
Căn hộ đẹp, không gian rộng rãi thoáng mát. View biển nhìn ra cầu Bãi Cháy. Giá căn hộ cho thuê phải nói là quá rẻ so với gì căn hộ này mang lại.
nice and big airbnb in Ha Long, very friendly and helpful owner!
Host Linh is nice, the place is quiet and good view, near to local market and easy to find good restaurant

Nous avons beaucoup apprécié notre séjour. Linh est une hôte merveilleuse, et souhaite clairement que ses locataires passent un bon séjour chez elle. L'appartement est bien situé, just à côté de la plage avec une belle vue du pont Bai Chay. Très propre et fidèle aux photos. Vivement recommendé.
Great place to stay. The host was friendly and helpful. We’ll definitely come back next time
房主很热情，让我住宿体验很舒服，还主动开车带我们去租摩托车
Chỗ ở tuyệt vờii hỗ trợ nhanh ơi là nhanh
The house was convenience as reasonable price. Thanks
WORTH THE MONEY !! GREAT STAY AND EASIER TO REACH ALL THE NEARBY SIGHTSEEING SPOTS , WONDERFUL TIME in HA LONG BAY !
nice, responsive host!

Phòng sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi, view nhìn ra biển và cáp treo rất đẹp để ngắm hoàng hôn. Chủ nhà thân thiện, hỗ trợ khách rất nhiệt tình. Ngoại trừ việc thang máy và phòng ở tòa này đánh số hơi lạ nên hơi khó tìm phòng một xíu ra thì mọi thứ đều rất tuyệt vời. Xuống sảnh là thấy vòng quay mặt trời Sun Wheel, đi bộ xíu là ra đường bao biển, xung quanh rất gần cửa hàng tiện lợi, nhà hàng, quán ăn, cafe,... Một trải nghiệm đi Hạ Long rất tuyệt vời nha
Was a really wonderful stay, had a great view and it was really clean. She was really responsive and helped us a lot. I recommend this accommodation!

Anh Kiên là 1 chủ nhà tuyệt vời với dịch vụ siêu siêu tốt. Anh ấy hướng dẫn gia đình mình checkin tỉ mỉ và còn giới thiệu những địa điểm ở Hạ Long nên đỡ bỡ ngỡ hẳn.
Nhà có view khá chill, sạch sẽ và mọi thứ đúng như trong ảnh, nhận phòng dễ dàng
Sẽ quay lại những lần sau.

Tôi đã có một trải nghiệm tuyệt vời. Phòng ở sạch sẽ. View đẹp hơn nhiều so với trên ảnh. Không khí trong lành, hoàng hôn nơi đây rất đáng để các bạn trải nghiệm.
Chủ nhà thân thiện, hướng dẫn nhiệt tình giúp tôi có những khám phá thú vị tại Hạ Long.
Nhờ có căn bếp và hướng dẫn của bạn, tôi đã có một bữa ăn hải sản tươi ngon tại nhà.
Rất cảm ơn bạn. Có cơ hội tôi sẽ quay trở lại căn nhà của bạn.
Chủ nhà phản hồi nhanh và thân thiện. Chỗ ở giống trong ảnh, có view đẹp và khá thoải mái.

Phòng mới ,sạch sẽ ,nội thất hiện đại có view hướng biển đắc địa ,anh host hướng dẫn nhiệt tình luôn luôn chủ động mỗi lúc khách cần tư vấn địa điểm vui chơi ăn uống đầy đủ và chi tiết .sẽ quay lại đây vào lần tới
Có mấy quả ảnh chụp cho vợ con đẹp hết ý

Our stay at Kane's house was fantastic! The apartment was spotlessly clean and fully equipped with everything we needed. Kane was very helpful and provided great local tips. The car picked us up from the airport was cheaper than Grab. Provided a safe and accurate cruise to visit Halong Bay at a reasonable price. There are many restaurants around the building. We look forward to coming back! Thank you so much Kane

Tôi đã có trải nghiệm tuyệt vời nhất khi ở căn hộ xinh đẹp này tại Hạ Long. Vị trí hoàn hảo cho tầm nhìn toàn cảnh tuyệt đẹp ra Vịnh từ ban công. Chỗ ở sạch sẽ được bảo trì tốt và được thiết kế đẹp mắt với bầu không khí ấm cúng mang lại cảm giác như ở nhà ,chủ nhà vô cùng thân thiện và phản hồi nhanh đưa ra các đề xuất tuyệt vời cho nhà hàng và các hoạt động địa phương như đi tàu thăm vịnh. Bảo tàng ,thư viện… thuê xe máy , xe đưa đón tại sân bay. chủ nhà đều giúp đỡ tôi
Điểm nổi bật của thời gian lưu trú chắc chắn là buổi sáng và buổi tối thanh bình trên ban công riêng tận hưởng làn nước yên tĩnh và thiên nhiên xung quanh. Các điểm tham quan gần đó rất dễ tiếp cận và khu vực này cảm thấy yên bình đầy đủ mọi thứ để khám phá vì đây là trải nghiệm airbnb thứ hai của tôi với căn hộ này tất cả gia đình chúng tôi đều rất hài lòng với chuyến tham quan ở đây
Nếu bạn đang tìm kiếm một kỳ nghỉ thư giãn và đáng nhớ ở vịnh Hạ Long tôi rất đề xuất chỗ ở này
Vị trí thuận tiện di chuyển, phòng có mùi tinh dầu rất dễ chịu và có view biển thoáng đãng, anh chủ nhà support nhiệt tình
Chủ nhà rất nhiệt tình, view đẹp, dễ tìm home, nhà cửa sạch sẽ nha mọi người. Veru Good! 5⭐️. I Love it😍

thật ngạc nhiên liệu với sô tiền bỏ ra.
một căn hộ sạch sẽ,gọn gàng
chủ nhà thân thiện và hồi đáp rất nhanh
có cơ hôi nên đến trải nghiệm

The apartment is located in high floor and the view from the window is fantastic. The host isvery nice, gave a lot of recommendations. I wouldn't say it's super clean, but it's quite acceptable. The kitchen has all the necessary equipments. There are a lot of small shops around, but good restaurants are not too close.
The biggest minus doesn't depend on thehost - there are crazy neighbors who opened the door wide open, listened to loud music, ate food with a strong smell, walked around naked and walked their children in the corridor. When asked to be a little quieter, they smiled and did nothing.
Nice stay before heading to Ha Long Bay! Amazing coffee shop just at bottom of apartment building. Host was super helpful and responsive, especially surrounding check in.

i was in Amazing 5days.
i have been HALONG BAY for work 5days.
this home memory super amazing house.
nice view , and clean , kind service, everything is perfact.
thank you. very much

케인의 방은 모든것이 훌륭합니다.
여행하는동안 케인은 나에게 도움을 주려 노력했고
방은 흠잡을데 없이 깨끗하고 좋았습니다.

We had just one night in Halong Bay before we bounced to our next destination and we are so so glad that we booked our stay in Trung Kein’s property. Our co-host Mr. Kane was super proactive and helped us right from the start. We wanted to rent a motorbike, he not only arranged it but also accompanied my husband to the pick up point and arranged a drop off on his own. The place was exactly how it was shown in the pictures and the balcony view was worth every penny. Thank you Kane for being such an amazing host and an amazing person as well. We highly recommend this place if you are planning a trip to Halong Bay
Great location and host was very helpful
a few hours power cut was there. other than that everything was good

Amazing apartment in a great location.
Host was responsive and even helped with motorcycle rentals, excursions and cabs.
Great place to stay with great views of the bay
公寓位置不错，距离下龙湾打车15分钟左右，房东挺热情，有疑问反馈的及时准确
the host Is always ready to reply quickly and friendly. the view is amazing.
Wonderful place, the price is surprisingly cheaper than the quality of the room. It has the best view to watch sunset in Ha Long, I will definitely stay here again.
Excellent pad
Alles so wie es sein sollte 👍
Nice play for a quick stop !
Phòng mình thuê sạch sẽ tiện nghi, cũng gần chợ và tiện đi lại, chủ nhà hỗ trợ nhiệt tình và hầu như ngay lập tức, lần tới ở Hạ Long mình chắc chắn sẽ thuê tiếp
đc của ló
good
Good

Tôi đã từng ở đây trước đó và vẫn tiếp tục lựa chọn căn hộ của Minh mỗi khi quay lại. Căn hộ luôn rất sạch sẽ, rộng rãi và thoải mái. Ngoài ra còn có một ban công thoáng mát, nơi bạn có thể bước ra ngắm cảnh và thư giãn. Rất hài lòng!

Great place to stay, tidy and very luxurious. Amenities such as pool etc not included in price (they don’t tell you until you book).
Hot water great and minh was helpful with the check in and any extra questions we had.
Over all, great place!

The room was spacious, luxurious and modern, it had amazing views overlooking HaLong Bay. The bath was really nice to have after wanting to relax for a few days. This stay was the perfect place to chill out!
We arrived at 3am and Minh made sure we had hot water on arrival, check-in instructions were simple to follow also!
5* 🙏🏻

Very cute well supplied studio apartment with a small deck. Clean, modern building with good security. Must check restaurant schedules, we used the spa which was lovely. Minh is an excellent communicator with excellent response time and was very helpful. we would highly recommend this airbnb!

It was a great place to stay. Good bird's eye view of the halong bay. The apartment complex also has a great roof top with a good bar & juice cafe. The host was super responsive and very helpful. Overall, one of the best choice for a good stay.

Minh was super accommodating and truly an amazing host. We had some changes and she was very flexible and very prompt to answer. I would absolutely recommend staying at her place to anyone looking for a quiet, peaceful oasis. The food was absolutely amazing as was the coffee from the cafe. The breakfast buffet was delicious. The spa and pools were awesome there is even 3 jacuzzi’s to choose from and a bar. Great price for the amenities available and a quick grab away from the town but very close walk to the beach.

What a beautiful stay! Very comfortable and nice views from a high floor. Great bed, heat and AC unit, spacious modern flat in a modern building. Minh was also very responsive and made our stay extremely pleasant. Highly recommend.

Căn hộ yên tĩnh, view biển hướng nhìn sang đảo Tuần Châu bình yên, ngắm hoàng hôn rất đẹp. Hơi xa trung tâm (từ đây đi taxi công nghệ tới chợ Cái Dăm hết 40K, đi sang Hòn Gai hết 170K) nhưng phù hợp với người lowkey như tôi. Nhà hàng ở tầng 2 giá cả chấp nhận được, đồ ăn cũng ok, phục vụ nhã nhặn dễ chịu (nên thử salad hải sản và mực chiên cháy tỏi). Bên trong căn hộ khá sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi, đồ bếp rất đầy đủ (nếu bạn là người thích ăn nước mắm thì sẽ ko tìm thấy trong căn hộ này, tuy nhiên nhờ thế kv bếp không bị ám mùi). Buồng tắm sạch, nước mạnh, thoát nước tốt, thơm tho. Chỉ một điểm trừ duy nhất là bình nước nóng dung tích nhỏ nên xả nước để ngâm bồn vào mùa đông bị thiếu.
Lần sau nếu muốn healing, t sẽ lại lựa chọn ở đây. T đã có một kỳ nghỉ lễ rất êm dịu.
Amazing place and great location! Looks exactly like the pictures and Minh was extremely responsive and helpful. I’ll be back in the future!
Really nice stay in a very nice building. Minh was fantastic to communicate with, very helpful. Would definitely stay again.

We had the best stay at Minh's apartment and really wish it wasn't only for one night! From start to finish the communication was prompt and clear, the host was very accommodating to our situation and when we arrived early, we were able to store our luggage.
The apartment itself is amazing and even better than shown in photos! Everything was in pristine condition, there were all kinds of amenities provided which make your stay extra comfortable, and the view was just the best!
Thank you so much for this experience and we definitely know where to stay again should we visit Halong in the future 😊

Great host, beautiful unit, beautiful beach view, comfortable bed, listing had accurate description. Host was very communicative and friendly. The only downside is that the resort does random beach parties as late as 10:30pm and as early as 7:30am so the bass from the speaker and the microphone noise travels all the way up to the room. There are food options available nearby, majority are very touristy and not delicious. If you’re willing to go into town 1-2km more local cuisine is available for better taste and much better price. Overall a good stay, we would encourage friends to stay here if they visit Ha Long Bay.

Minh hat eine tolle Unterkunft, die für diesen Preis wirklich unschlagbar ist. Alles ist super sauber, es gibt eine Waschmaschine, ein großes Bad und ein gemütliches Bad. Man kann auch das Gym und den Infinity Pool verwenden. Die einzige Down-Side ist die Lage, weil man für jede größere Aktivität in die Stadt fahren muss (kostet aber auch nur 4-5€ mit Grab). Zum entspannen oder für 2 Nächte um sich die Ha Long Bucht anzusehen ist es perfekt!

Minh has a beautiful apartment overlooking Ha Long bay - very private but with a great view of the beach (where we were lucky enough to see fireworks set off!) The cafe downstairs does an excellent coconut coffee and it’s a short walk or grab ride in to restaurants.
A standout for us was also Minh herself who is incredibly responsive, helpful and proactive. Thankyou for having us!

We spent 2 nights in this Airbnb, the apartment was perfect, hosting amazing views over halong, my only negative is the area that is ha long, no restaurants around the apartment apart from the one place with the apartment block.
This was well described by our host prior to arrival,
Minh has been a great host, keeping us updated though-out our stay.
Would 100% recommend this apartment.

The accommodation is extremely clean and tidy and there is a beautiful sunset from the window. Minh is very kind and responsive. When we arrived, she gave us a birthday cake even we had not mentioned about my accompany's birthday. She is always available to support the customers. I really love the accommodation and I would recommend it to anyone who want to spend a holiday in Ha Long.

Căn hộ đẹp, từ giường ngủ tôi có thể đón bình minh và ngắm hoàng hôn trên vịnh biển 😇 Chủ nhà cũng thân thiện. Trên tầng 40 toà nhà view được toàn cảnh vịnh Hạ Long, thưởng thức 1 ly cocktail nữa thì tuyệt nhưng cái bể bơi vô cực ngoài trời mùa này thì lạnh ngắt không bơi nổi. Tôi sẽ giới thiệu bạn bè của mình

Before we even arrived in Vietnam, Minh was incredibly helpful and responsive, answering all of my questions promptly and thoroughly. She arranged a smooth round-trip transfer for my partner and me from Hanoi to Halong, which made our travel stress-free.
Minh’s apartment was spacious, spotless, and thoughtfully equipped with everything we could possibly need for a comfortable stay. The hotel itself was stunning, featuring a luxurious indoor pool and jacuzzi, a rooftop infinity pool with breathtaking views, as well as on-site bars and a restaurant. There's even a convenient mini-mart located just downstairs.
The hotel staff were always warm, polite, and eager to help. They went above and beyond, even assisting us in organising an unforgettable Halong Bay cruise.
We couldn’t have asked for a better experience – highly recommended!

Die Unterkunft war genau wie qir uns ws vorgestellt haben. Es war alles vorhanden, was man im Urlaub benötigt.
Minh ist eine sehr freundliche und hilfsbereite Gastgeberin, die uns beim Transfer von Hanoi nach Ha Long unterstützt hat.
Für eine gehobene Unterkunft können wir es nur empfehlen.

I definitely recommend this place because it’s worth the money. I would love to stay here longer because the bed was so comfortable, and the bedsheets were cotton, which is very important to me. The bathroom was very relaxing, but there were some issues with the water—you couldn’t stay in the bath for too long because there wasn’t enough hot water. Maybe the situation is different in the summer, but we stayed here in March.
The location wasn’t ideal because there are no cafés nearby, only a restaurant on the top floor, which is very expensive. Plus, you can’t order food after 9 PM. However, if you’re staying here mainly for the beach, this is the perfect place.
The hotel was incredible, and the rooftop pool was amazing. I definitely recommend this place if you just want to relax in a nice hotel and either order food or cook for yourself.
if you’re looking for a beachside stay and prioritize comfort, cleanliness, and a well-maintained apartment, this is a great choice.

the place was really nice, beautiful and clean. everything felt very luxurious, from the apartment itself to the building, neighborhood and there's a great view of the ocean.
a great experience definitely recommend!

We have been travelling for over 6 months mainly staying in airbnbs and this is the most beautiful and comfortable apartment we have stayed in. The view is amazing, the bed really comfortable with an amazing shower as well. The host was really helpful with everything as well.

Great value for your money. The place is very impressive and luxurious. One of our favorite stays in all of Vietnam and very clean.
The host is extremely responsive and helpful. She helped us book a day cruise and transportation services easily. We are very grateful for her great service.
너무 좋은 시간이었습니다.다음 번에도 이곳을 이용할거에요.
phòng đẹp cực, sạch sẽ, có vấn đề gì nhắn tin anh chủ đều reply cực nhanh. phòng view cực thoáng, có đầy đủ tiện nghi lại còn gần chợ, 10 điểm không có nhưng, sẽ quay lại!
Quá tuyệt vời. Nếu có cơ hội sẽ quay lại!
Đến sớm hơn giờ nhận phòng 1h nhưng vẫn được hỗ trợ checkin. Thank you!
Квартира была очень красивой и атмосферной, очень добрые хозяева ❤️
Ok
Phòng sạch sẽ. Tiện nghi như ở nhà. Chủ nhà vui vẻ và giúp đỡ tôi nhiệt tình. Con gái tôi rất thích căn phòng này

We really enjoyed our stay at this luxury hotel airbnb. Our room was clean with a beautiful balcony view of the bay. Within the hotel, there are 2 pools, 2 gyms and a social room with a ball pit and pool table. The breakfast buffet was exceptional. The hotel has 2 restaurants and a sky bar that we really enjoyed. Once you’ve seen HaLong Bay by boat there’s not much else to do in the area so we’re very glad we stayed in this airbnb! We highly recommend.

By far, Dung was the best host I had in vn.  He went far and beyond to make me feel welcome at ha Long bay.   The studio was super clean with a nice view.  Dung even gave me a quick tour on his motorbike of nearby surroundings.   And if you need to rent a motorbike,  he can point you to the right direction to get one.    Best part was the price,  best bang for your buck!

Very nice place, just a little bit walk to the beach. room all clean, i like more is water pressure was excellent host Dung's always respond and give more information,recommented this place. stay with Dung!👍👍👍

للاسف تم حجز السقة وعند الوصول لم تكن نفس المواصفات
طلبت منه شقتي اللتي حجزتها او الالغاء
هو يعلم انني اتيت من سفر طويل
طلب مني ان اسكن فيها وانها جميله
لكن انا اقول تختلف عن الواقع
ذهب بي الى شقة اخرى
وقال هذه مناسبه لك كنت متعب واخذت الشقة كانت رائحة دواليب المطبخ سيئه في المساء انتظر مكيف يبر كان حار وتواصلت معه بااني اريد الغاء السكن يوم غد فقط يوم واحد
لم استطع النوم بسبب حراره مكيف الغرفه العليا
..
للعلم طلب مني الغاء الحجز وانه سوف يعطيني سعر افضل
رفضت ذلك بتاتاً
كي لايحصل على تقييم
للاسف انها حصلت معي
فيما بعد اي شخص سحجز لابد من ان يتاكد من المالك هل نفس الصور او لا
الحذر
Great host, pleasant stay in Vietnam. Very luxery building and great area! Would come back again!🕺
Recommend this place if you stay in ha long. Super welcoming host, nice location and totally worth the money.
民宿位于高层 ， 可以看到外面的海景 环境安逸 卫生很干净 。房主特别好 特意下来帮办理入住

Le logement est un appartement Airbnb dans un hôtel 5 étoiles (à savoir que la piscine est payante et non inclue)
Situé au 14ème étage, cet appartement propose une vue sublime sur la baie d'Ha Long et correspond exactement aux photos
De plus, Dung est très réactif et saura vous aider et vous conseiller pour quelconque raison, c'est très appréciable!
Excellent rapport qualité/prix!
Great room in a modern tower, with fantastic views to ha long bay. Near to cruise deck (15min grab ride) and excellent accommodation. I would recommend it
I love the condo it was very nice and clean and convenient very close to the beach and restaurants and shopping overall this place was great. thank you
our stay was very pleasant and comfortable we really felt like staying with a old friend. And we highly recommend to others ... this is a five star experience for US
And the best host in Vietnam award goes to him…. 🏆🏆
房东很礼貌客气，房子景色很好
Very helpful in everything during our stay in Ha Long.
너무도 친절하시고 일처리가  깔끔하신  호스트님  최고..
Nous avons passé un très bon séjour, le logement est super avec une vue imprenable sur la ville.
Hôte très acceuillant et réactif
The host is REALLYYYYY NICE.

Tôi đã có một trải nghiệm tốt tại căn hộ này. Bạn nam, người mà đã đón và đưa tôi lên phòng rất chuyên nghiệp và chu đáo, luôn sẵn sàng hỗ trợ bất kể thời gian nào trong ngày với thái độ thân thiện và tận tâm. Vệ sinh được đảm bảo tuyệt đối, mọi không gian trong phòng đều sạch sẽ, gọn gàng. Tiện nghi đầy đủ, mang lại cảm giác thoải mái như ở nhà. Vị trí căn hộ khá thuận tiện, dễ dàng di chuyển đến các điểm tham quan. Đây sẽ là lựa chọn ưu tiên của tôi khi đi nghỉ tại Hạ Long.
Lần thứ 2 đến với Samset và cực kỳ hài lòng với chị chủ nhà thân thiện. Mình là người ưa sạch sẽ gọn gàng và thơm tho nên rất ưng ý căn homestay này <3
một cảm giác rất tuyệt vời khi đến đây, bình yên, nhẹ nhàng. có thể nằm lười trong phòng tĩnh lặng hoặc bước xuống chân toà nhà là có thể đi dạo ở biển.
Căn hộ mới, tất cả mọi thứ rất sạch sẽ, đầy đủ và đúng như trong ảnh. Tầm nhìn panorama siêu đẹp. Một căn hộ đáng trải nghiệm. Chủ nhà siêu thân thiện, nhiệt tình.

The location, the property, the host- everything is just perfect. We had the best time there and would love to book the same property each time I visit Ha-long. I am definitely gonna recommend this to my friends and family as well. They have the best view and facilities to make your stay smooth and comfortable, trust me guys don’t think twice and just book this, you won’t regret.
之前我来越南都住酒店，但这次，我发现公寓，发现它更符合我的需求。朋友来访非常方便，不会遇到任何麻烦；有阳台可以吸烟，这一点对我来说很重要；海鲜非常新鲜美味；房东的服务非常周到，不仅熟悉周边环境，还能详细指引赌场、咖啡馆等娱乐场所，甚至安排专车接送，司机驾驶技术娴熟、路线熟悉且非常有礼貌..非常棒的公寓，推荐大家可以试一下，

a short stay here but the feeling is great. The owner is very friendly, the reception is very attentive (the owner has a very nice voice), the room view is so beautiful, super chill, the food around is very delicious. and the room price is so cheap
We had a lovely stay and everything was as described. Perfect location to explore Ha Long Bay and suprised how much else there was to do aside of the cruises.
Ekip tuyệt vời, cám ơn

Had a nice stay here.The sunrise views were beautiful, and I liked that I could enjoy the sunlight while staying indoors. It was a comfortable and relaxing experience.
The host was helpful and arranged a beachfront dinner at the base of the building, which was a nice touch. The room was clean, smelled fresh, and felt well-maintained.
The Skybar on the 40th floor had a great view, especially in the evening. Breakfast had a decent selection, and for lunch, I found a local spot nearby serving “bun cu ky” for only $1.50 USD – good value for money.
The heated pool and jacuzzi were available, and the entry fee was reasonable. For what I paid, I was satisfied with the experience. A good option for a short stay.
Enthusiastic homestay owner, clean room, beautiful view to watch the sunset, convenient location near the beach

Host nhiệt tình, chu đáo, giải đáp mọi thắc mắc của tôi rất chi tiết. Đồng thời phòng vô cùng sạch sẽ, view đỉnh, và quan trọng là không gian ruêng tư ấm cúng. Tôi đã có khoảng thời gian tuyệt vời tại đây.

The apt was so spacious and clean. The host is super friendly and accommodating. She assisted us with early checkin and bike rental services, etc. Highly recommend for anyone whos planning to visit Ha Long.

Ly’s place was just what I needed for much a needed respite. I wanted a comfy bed and bathtub and got so much more.
The space is very large, the bed is super comfortable and with four pillows. The shower is huge with hand sprayer or waterfall.
The bathtub is very large for relaxing. The pool and jacuzzi and sauna on the second floor are perfect. Ly thought of many details down to garlic with the cooking oil.
She booked me a bay cruise that picked me up at A La carte. It was a most excellent experience.
We had a very good experience staying in Ly's place. She was always responsive and helpful. Vietnam is a wonderful country.

I have been travelling in Vietnam for 10 months.  Of all the places I have stayed, ... this was the best.  The room is big and new and has everything you need, inside a wonderful hotel with a pool, weight room, and spa.  The room also has a wonderful bathtub, which is very rare in Vietnam.  The host is responsive and helpful.  If you are looking for a place in Ha Long Bay, this is the place.  Look no further.  Highly recommend.

The place is strategically located, with a nice public beach directly facing the ha long bay. The room is spacious, complete with a sofa and a small dining table for 2. The bathroom is also spacious, the shower room is separated from the bathtub.
Easy access. Has a hotel lobby for transport / pick up. Around the lobby area, there is a convenient store, an ice cream parlor and a cafe.
Great place to stay, clean comfortable and had everything we needed. Host is responsive and resolved every issue. Recommended!

Chỗ ở sạch sẽ, sang trọng, gần biển, có chỗ chơi trẻ con ở tầng 3, bể bơi vô cực tầng 40 view đẹp. Đi lại thuận tiện gần các khu vui chơi và ăn uống. Chủ nhà Ly hỗ trợ rất nhiệt tình và nhanh chóng cho các vấn đề phát sinh. Cảm giác thư thái như ở nhà.
Je recommande, l’appartement est haut de gamme. Tout près de la plage. Et il y a de nombreux services dans l’immeuble (restaurant, bar , piscine, …) très agréable.
Tout était parfait ! Les indications étaient claires. La plage est magnifique avec un beau coucher de soleil !

Lys place is super nice!! Loved how comfy the bed was compared to many places in the area. It’s super soft and plush. I fell ill during my stay so I was grateful to have a comfortable place to recover. It’s right next to the beach, too.
The host is helpful and proactive to support. I’m happy with my stay there. The apartment is well equipped and private. Will introduce to my friends and stay here again if coming back.

It was a plush, luxury apartment in a sea facing building in a new area of the city. The feel was really superb at this apartment and Ly was a superb host, always proactive to provide all information and help.
The place is little farther away from the main touristic part of city, but once someone has a scooter or cab, the most places are like 15 to 30 min drive from here.
The local beach from this building is just 1 min walk, and is super convenient. The view from this apartment is that of city, but from 20th floor it's a wonderful view.
Must recommended.

I had an incredible stay at this 5-star property booked through Airbnb! The host's proactive communication, seamless information flow, and continuous responsiveness truly set the experience apart. The property's prime location right in front of the beach made it easily accessible and well-connected to the city.
The host went above and beyond by providing a comprehensive guidebook with local information, ensuring a smooth and enjoyable stay. I highly recommend this place to fellow travelers – a hidden gem waiting to be discovered!
I'm definitely coming back!

I enjoyed staying at Lu’s place. The room is spacious and comfortable. Nice beds and amenities. The hotel is pretty convenient with bars, coffee shop, restaurant and mini mart. Rooftop view is amazing. Ly is very helpful and responsive! Highly recommend

Appartement de bon standing, très propre et fonctionnel, avec une superbe vue sur la mer. Le restaurant Le Marché, à l’entrée de la résidence au premier étage, propose des plats délicieux avec un excellent service. La piscine de la résidence est payante, nous sommes allés à la plage qui est à deux pas, avec une eau à 35 degrés.
Je vous recommande sans hésiter, le séjour chez Ly est inoubliable

Pobyt byl skvělý moc jsme si ho užili, příjezd byl při nás těchto matoucí, ale nakonec jsme se zvládli ubytovat v pořádku. Byt je krásně čistý a moderní s veškerým vybavením, které člověk potřebuje 😊🫶🏻 děkujeme Ly

Amazing place! Ly is a lovely host who helped me arrange balloons as a surprise for my boyfriend’s 25th birthday, they were amazing! The place is very clean, amazing bath which runs hot water which is nice when you’re used to staying in home stays and having cold showers! Used the kitchen facilities too which were great. The building has a lovely bar upstairs which we used and we paid to use the indoor pool and jacuzzis for the day which was a nice treat when the weather wasn’t great. Only a short drive from restaurants/ bars, and downstairs they have a mini mart and nice cafe!
Overall amazing experience would recommend to anyone and would love to come back one day! Ly was amazing and very responsive too, thank you so much🤍🤍

Unser Aufenthalt war top. Preis Leistungs Verhältnis war super und es war super schön. Die Wohnung sieht so aus wie auf den Bildern und man fühlt sich direkt wohl. Ly ist auch eine super nette und zuvorkommende Gastgeberin die schnell Antwort und hilfsbereit ist.

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour chez Ly. Le seul point négatif a été notre arrivée. Nous sommes arrivés tard dans la nuit, et comme la réception était fermée, nous avons dû nous débrouiller pour accéder au logement par nous-mêmes. Heureusement, nous avons croisé une personne qui résidait dans la même résidence et qui a gentiment accepté de nous accompagner jusqu'à notre logement.
Mis à part cela, le logement est vraiment magnifique, très bien équipé et globalement propre ! Nous avons particulièrement apprécié la salle de bain, avec sa baignoire !
Merci pour ce séjour !
It was a really nice place, everything was smooth for the beginning to the end. I really appreciate my stay here !
We really enjoyed our stay. Check In was very easy and Ly was responsive and friendly. Would book it again.

awesome apartment, very well equipped, including a toaster and a brand new coffee maker, which was a nice touch.
Big bath with enough hot water to fill up ( yes that is very rare in vietnam) everything was clean and high quality.
The building also has a rooftop bar, a little supermarket, cafe and restaurant.
There’s a nice little gym that I used couple of times free of charge ( no one asked me for payment so assuming it’s free )
A beautiful rooftop pool and jacuzzis with a nice view of the bay at night.
Overall really enjoyed the couple of days here after riding a motorcycle all over Vietnam for nearly two weeks.
Really good host, replies quickly and makes the experience super smooth.
It’s a 10 from me by any standards but exceptional by what you usually get in Vietnam for that price.
Would definitely recommend.
Mike

This apartment is nice, clean, quiet, safe, comfortable with good view.
I really relaxed at this place. I highly recommend

Chỗ mình ở trong chuyến đi Hạ Long lần này thật sự rất ổn áp, cực kỳ sạch sẽ và gọn gàng. Check-in nhanh gọn, không mất thời gian. Chị chủ nhà thì siêu dễ thương, thân thiện và cực kỳ nhiệt tình, cái gì cũng hỗ trợ hết mình. Không gian ấm cúng, mọi thứ được chăm chút kỹ nên cảm giác rất thoải mái. Đặc biệt là view cực đẹp, ngồi chill buổi sáng hay tối đều thấy thích. Nói chung là quá hài lòng luôn!
Chỗ ở rất đẹp, chị chủ nhà thân thiện, view của phòng lẫn tiện ích đều quá oki so với tầm giá!!
Chị chủ rất thân thiện, hỗ trợ nhiệt tình, phòng view rất đẹp, sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi.
We arrived at 4am, Ly Ly was very helpful in communicating how to get into the room. Also contacting the manager of the apartments for us to help us.
Lovely clean apartment and a very friendly, helpful host. thankyou Ly Ly!
The view is absolutely beautiful ♥️and the room is beautiful

Ly Ly is a super host super nice super kind and always available for help. The stay was very cosy calm and as she always say you feel like home. I highly recommend the stay at her space and i would definitely do it again.

Rất cảm ơn chị chủ vì đã hỗ trợ nhiệt tình gia đình tôi trong kỳ nghỉ lễ vừa rồi. Phòng khách sạn rất đẹp và sạch sẽ, vị trí đi lại cũng thuận tiện trong quá trình ăn uống và đặc biệt có chỗ đỗ được xe.
Nếu có dịp quay lại Hạ Long, gia đình tôi chắc chắn sẽ đặt lại căn hộ này.
Đây là một nơi lý tưởng để trải nghiệm và du lịch khi đến Hạ Long.

awesome stay at Lyly's place. I wouldn't think twice about coming back if I stop by ha long bay in the future.
We were just starting our trip in Vietnam and Lyly was really helpful about a lot of details.
I thank her again for the awesom start in this wonderful country, city and apartment.
Good place
Vị trí rất đẹp, phòng sạch sẽ, rất muốn quay lại lần tiếp theo

Great place to stay. Some areas a little unclean but comfortable to live in. We weren’t aware you had to pay to access the pool (although managed to use when no staff around). Would stay again. Nice quiet area with a short-ish taxi into town.

Unfortunately, we had to leave the first night after the presence of black mold on the walls and ceiling. I actually asked if the place had been cleaned prior to our stay, it was very dirty ie: hair, grease, stains. Communication was smooth and Ly Ly was apologetic and even sent the manager to come clean. Hopefully it will receive a deep clean and be available in the near future. Ly Ly's has the potential to be something great.
Very comfortable
Ly Ly ist eine sehr gute Gastgeberin, sehr zuvorkommend und nett. Die Wohnung war wie beschrieben, sehr geräumig. In dem Gebäude befindet sich ein kleiner Markt, was kann hilfreich sein kann.

O locuinta foarte frumoasa, curata, intru-n bloc superb, cu o vedere splendida catre golful ha long.
Ne-am simtit minunat. Multumim Ly Ly!
Nice place to stop for the night before our cruise. Plenty of restaurants a short walk away, but the on-site restaurant (Soul Bowl) was surprisingly good :)
Phòng hướng biển rất đẹp. Tuy nhiên cần cải thiện đồ đạc đi kèm để khách được cảm giác chất lượng tốt hơn.
Chị chủ rất dễ thương, support nhiệt tinh, nơi ở siêu chill, có chỗ đỗ xe rộng rãi, lần sau đến vẫn sẽ tìm đến đây.

Apartment was well equipped and clean. Host responded promptly to messages and offered early check in. Great view from the room too. Overall excellent experience and great value, would highly recommend.
Ngoc's place was awesome! It had everything and was in a great spot. The view of Ha Long Bay was amazing. The host was super helpful with everything. We should totally go back sometime.
view đẹp, xứng đáng tiền bỏ ra
phòng rất tốt!!!
숙소의 view도 아름다웠고 샤워시설과 용변시설이 나뉘어져있는게 편리했으며, 호스트의  응답이 굉장히 빨라서 만약에 무슨 일이 있어도 신속하게 처리 가능할거에요.

I highly recommend these apartments! Great view from the window, everything matches the photos. I also highly recommend this part of the city for walking. It is a very modern and beautiful area, where the spirit of the old city and Vietnamese streets has been preserved. Five stars!

Absolute bargain for the standard of apartment and views from it. Bed is comfy, kitchen is well enough equipped, and surrounding area has some very pretty architecture. Seller also communicates excellently and you can check in any time you like
Only complaints would be it’s not super clear in the photos, but the doors to the toilet and shower are frosted glass rather than solid wood or other material. This for me was fine as I stayed alone, but not my preference had I been staying with a partner.
Amazing Place with Great View ) convenient parking spots available if you are traveling with your own transport and close to harbor
Muy buen departamento, tiene una vista espectacular. Para acceder es muy simple. además, la anfitriona muy atenta y respondía a la brevedad. 100% recomendado
Phòng đẹp như ảnh, sạch sẽ, view biển như ảnh. Chủ nhà phản hồi nhanh chóng. Sẽ quay lại ạ

Hang’s place was nice and clean with all the amenities in place. The view is beautiful in the evening overlooking the sea. Lots of restaurants in vicinity and convenience store in the building itself. If you’re looking for a quiet place far from the traffic then would highly recommended his place in Ha Long.
老板非常贴心 询问了具体到达时间以及发送了开门密码 房间非常干净 风景很好 厨房可以做饭 由于可能是在当地饭店吃了不新鲜的海鲜导致严重腹泻并且发烧 需要去河内医院进行治疗 与老板沟通提前一天退房 老板非常爽快了答应了 并表示理解
因为有事 提前几天退房  老板很好 同意退房.房源很好性价比很高

Wir haben uns schnell wohl gefühlt.
Die Lage ist gut, man hat einen Straßen-Markt um die Ecke und paar Restaurants.
Sehr praktisch war der Supermarkt im Gebäude selbst.
Das einzige was schade ist, dass die Waschmaschine nur mit kalten Wasser funktioniert. Auch putzen muss man selber. Man kann sowohl eine raumreinigung als auch eine Wäscheservice dazu buchen.
Das Fitnessstudio war nicht im Preis inklusive und leider auch teuerer als angeben.
Wir haben uns aber sehr wohl gefühlt und blieben 5 Wochen.
Danke für die schöne Unterkunft mit tollem Blick auf die ha Long bay!

căn hộ sạch sẽ, gọn gàng nội thất hiện đại, cho bạn cảm giác như đang ở nhà. chủ nhà thân thiện giúp đỡ rất nhiều. căn hộ có tầm nhìn tuyệt vời, bạn có thể nhìn thấy biển. đây là một lựa chọn tốt, chúng tôi đề xuất địa điểm này

Chị Hằng rất thân thiện, nhiệt tình hướng dẫn. Chị tạo điều kiện cho chúng tôi trả phòng muộn.
Hãy hỏi chị về dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay cho nhóm 4 người về căn hộ.
Một trải nghiệm tuyệt vời khi đến Hạ Long.
Phòng sạch sẽ, tiện đường,view thẳng ra vịnh.
Cám ơn!
Все отлично, есть посуда для готовки.

Amazing place which is even better than in the pictures! Very cosy, we have even decided to extend our stay by a few days. Very clean and responsive host, I highly recommend this place. To get around easier I recommend also renting a bike since we were just a bit outside of the very busy city area. Also, the best smoothies around hahah.

Great place and stunning views! Everything was just perfect, starting from the cleanliness to the location, and the comfort of the flat itself. Hằng is an excellent host, always responding very quickly and always supportive about every questions we had! Everything was as described and we didn't miss any single thing! Thank you Hằng! :)

"Hằng's apartment was simply perfect! The view was breathtaking, and the place was immaculate with all the amenities you could ask for. What truly stood out was Hằng's exceptional hospitality. She went the extra mile to guide us around the neighborhood and the city, making our stay unforgettable. Highly recommended!"
Une vue impressionnante sur la baie d’Halong et les environs
挺好   房间很漂亮
The apartment itself is amazing but the view from the 23rd floor is priceless. You can admire the limestone karsts directly from your bed. We stayed for one month and will definetely come back again.
We loved this place so much, we extended our stay. The view is amazing and is just so quiet. Not many restaurants around but there are a couple of cafes with great banh mi just outside the building.

Very clean and comfortable apartment.  Several Mini-Marts nearby for water & snacks.  No real restaurants or coffee shops in walking distance so Grab ride  is the only option.  I enjoyed the little balcony and the washing machine!  If you have a car this is a great stay!

Stayed here for around 20 days in Januar.
Would definitely return if we had the change.
Vietnam usually is warm to hot. However in the northern region they do have wintertime and the apartment does not have heating (aircon doesn't heat either). We were so unlucky to have temperatures around 15C in the house half of our stay.
Keep this in mind in wintertime, as you can have some bad luck and really need warm clothes and the thick warm bedsheets provided.

ONE OF THE BEST APPARTMENT WITH FULLY MODERN AMENITIES , SERIOUSLY THE LOCATION WAS AWESOME AND ROOM VIEW WAS GREAT EXPERIENCE DIRECTLY OCEAN BAY WAS SEEING FROM ROOM , ROOM WAS ON 23 FLOOR WITH MANY LIFTS OPTION,  I STAY 2 DAYS REALLY VERY COMFORTABLE PLACE. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED..

Great Place
Halong City doesn’t have much to offer—there aren’t many attractions, and the beach isn’t very appealing. That said, this building is probably the best option in the area. It’s right by the sea, with restaurants and a convenience store in the building, which was super convenient.
The WiFi was good, and it was comfortable to work from there. The lobby is great and also very work-friendly.
Important to note: the gym and pool cost extra. We weren’t even allowed to look at the pool without paying, which was a bit disappointing.
The staff was friendly, and the host helped us with everything we needed.

This apartment is beautiful, with an incredible view over Ha Long Bay. The beach is right in front. The apartment is spacious, comfortable, and perfect for a relaxing stay. I highly recommend this place for anyone looking to stay in the area!

We returned to Minh Vui’s place once again. I love working in this space—a spacious, comfortable apartment with a stunning ocean view.
Minh Vui provided everything I needed for work: high-speed Wi-Fi, a comfortable desk and chair. And, of course, the bed was spacious and super cozy.
I highly recommend this wonderful apartment and its amazing host to everyone!

Minh Vui’s place is fantastic, the best we’ve experienced so far in Vietnam. Minh Vui is also very responsive and friendly as a host. The room is comfortable, spacious and even luxurious for Vietnamese standards. The bed, couch area, small kitchenette and bathroom were very clean and tidy. There’s a beautiful view from the bathtub across the room and to the Halong Bay limestone karsts. There’s either an infinity pool with jacuzzis or indoor pool with jacuzzis accessible for 120 VND per person for 1 time use. There’s a homemade/artisanal icecream shop (with limited flavours but very tasty and reasonable price) at the main floor of the building. Halong Bay isn’t necessarily very pretty or very developed, so location-wise it was slightly disappointing to us (with no nice cafés or restaurants, or even shops at walking distance). Nevertheless, great place, would recommend for a relaxing comfortable stay!

We had a great stay at Minh’s place. It was spacious, modern, and quiet. The apartment is right by the beach. There are restaurants, cafe, and a minimart down stairs. We loved it and will plan to come back again!!
