We had a wonderful stay in this apartment! The balcony was cozy with plants and offered a stunning view – the perfect spot to relax. The apartment was clean, the bed was comfortable, and the bathroom was great. The building also had a sky bar with a magical view over the bay – truly a highlight. You could feel that it was part of a hotel building, but having a supermarket downstairs was super convenient. There weren’t many restaurants nearby, but the apartment itself met all our needs. Phoung was a fantastic host – quick to respond, helpful, and genuinely kind. We highly recommend her and the apartment to anyone visiting Halong!

La host è davvero fantastica! Super gentile e sempre disponibile, abbiamo avuto qualche problema con questioni esterne all'alloggio e lei è stata sempre presente e ha fatto il possibile per aiutarci❤️ La dobbiamo davvero ringraziare
la casa è nuova, pulita, ordinata e ha tutto il necessario anche per una permanenza lunga. La vista dal balcone è mozzafiato.
Consiglio veramente
The place is very cozy, it has everything you need if you want to cook for yourself. It's a very nice and well-maintained place. It's close to restaurants and other attractions.

Phuong is a great host, very nice and helpful. We had and issue and she responded immediately, I really appreciated that. The apartment is nice, fully equipped if someone wants to stay long term. Beautiful view.

Literally the nicest stay with a even nicer host… the best part was where we couldn’t make it to the day we had booked for due to some ferry issues from Cat-Ba….. but she rescheduled the room for us for the next day! Free if cost…. Always responded on time and was always helpful!
Would recommend to everyone if ur craving a luxurious stay … look no further! This is perfect!!

Phuong's studio is gorgeous. Its done up so well. We absolutely loved the interiors and how well its designed. Its perfect for a couple or any two people, super comfortable and has a great view of the bay. Phuong is a lovely host, very helpful and responsive. We wished we could extend our stay at her place.
Thank you for hosting us 🥹 we literally loved our time here, Hope we can stay a bit longer. And thanks for the beer can haha :)
Clean, good location, very proactive communication from the host's side, would definitely recommend!

The room was very nice and had a beautiful view over the bay. The room was very clean and modern.
Thanks for the comfortable stay Ms Phoung!
she was so lovely  and accomadating. beautiful  apartment with everything you need and beautiful view

Everything about my stay here was perfect! Phuong was incredibly helpful, friendly, supportive and easy to reach. She did so much more for me than one could reasonably expect, she even sent an item that I had forgotten at the place to Hanoi for me and helped me arrange everything about the delivery. The apartment is exactly what you see on the pictures. Everything looks very well kept and clean. I enjoyed the comfortable bed, the great view from the balcony and especially the bathtub and shower! If you have spent a while in other places in Vietnam, you learn to appreciate a shower with good water pressure and temperature! Phuong made sure to come every few days to clean the apartment, which is very valuable for long-term stays like mine. I can fully recommend everything about the place, and with this host you will never have any trouble! She is a gem :)

Apartment exceeded our expectations! stunning apartment, comfy bed
building with pool
Skybar and all facilities! Killer view! Loved it we wanted to extend but unfortunatley we could not! Recommended!
amazing apartment at an amazing spot. Phuong was absolutley brilliant. we areived early and she helped us with our bags. Highly recommended and would definetley book again. thank you Phuong x

Great place to stay, overlooking the Bay! The place was absolutely great, felt like home straight away, everything you needed for some days stay there was available! Would definitely recommend!
She was always quick to respond and help with everything! We feel really thankful
Lovely apartment overlooking Halong bay. Comfortable and easily accessible. Walking distance to restaurants and shops and Phuong was helpful and flexible. Will definitely recommend

Cô chủ nhỏ rất thân thiện, thường phản hồi ngay lập tức khi chúng tôi có yêu cầu. Citadines Hạ long là một toà nhà rất dễ tìm và phòng tôi thuê có tầm nhìn rất đẹp. Giai đoạn này do các công trình xung quanh đang thi công nên tiếp cận biển hơi khó nhưng với người không có nhu cầu tắm biển như tôi cũng khoing ảnh hưởng lắm. Khi có điều kiện chắc chắn tôi sẽ trở lại nơi này.
Phòng sạch sẽ, view ra biển khá thoáng và đẹp, đầy đủ tiện nghi. Vị trí thuận tiện đi lại, bãi đỗ xe thoải mái. Có quán ăn, siêu thị nhỏ, quán bar trong toà nhà. Chủ nhà rất nhiệt tình dễ mến.

Das Apartment ist modern eingerichtet und sehr sauber. Der checkin war flexibel und unkompliziert möglich.
Das Gebäude ist nicht mitten in der belebten Gegend gelegen. Für uns war das aber kein Problem.
Das Gebäude hat einen kleinen Supermarkt, in dem man abends noch schnell Getränke oder anderes bekommen kann.
Merci beaucoup pour ce bel appartement très calme dans une belle résidence, et pour votre disponibilité ☺️
Phuong was a great host and always responsive to our queries and helped us with any doubts we had. The apartment has great views and amenities.
Nice 5-star experience. Loved everything about the stay. Great place, location, crockery, linen. Everything was perfect

Beau petit studio au 5e étage du Citadine. Le corridor est en rénovation et n’avait pas d’électricité, mais rendu dans le logement tout était bien, sauf le lit qui était assez dur.
Il y a un restaurant dans la bâtisse qui est très bon et vous pouvez obtenir un petit rabais en mentionnant que vous habitez dans l’immeuble en mentionnant votre numéro de chambre.
Aussi, près du Night market pour faire des achats mais à noter qu’il faut marcher pour trouver des restaurants et des cafés.

Mọi thứ ok hết nha mọi người ơi. Recommend mọi người căn hộ này nha.
Chủ nhà ơi, cái mềnh dày tí cho êm ấm nhen

We had a wonderful stay at this apartment! It was clean, comfortable, and exactly as described.  The host was friendly, responsive, and made check-in a breeze. We felt right at home and would definitely stay here again. Highly recommended!
Phòng nghỉ sạch đẹp, view biển, chủ nhà dễ tính, nhiệt tình, chỗ ở lý tưởng!!!

The host was amazing and the location is perfect and a great place to.! We would recommend the Appartment management team to have better training on maintaining the place ..! The housekeeping was not aware of how to set up the room .!

The place is as advertised. The view is great. Was peaceful and quiet Their are a few shops and restaurant's close by but if you want to go into town you need transportation. We rented a scooter which was perfect, small parking fee. We booked the place for 7 days and enjoyed it so much we extended our stay another 5 days before going back to Hanoi.
It was one of the most beautiful stays I've ever stayed at. Loved the view, the location and the host.

Lovely stay here. Clean and homely. Host was super friendly and responsive. View of the bay was really nice even on the cloudy days we were there. Being able to use the machine was perfect - Balcony was a huge bonus too. Everything we needed to cook utensil wise. For the price this place is 10/10

We had a very pleasant stay with Huyen as our host. She was very responsive and flexible and even approved of our late checkout request. The flat is tidy and provides a nice view. We recommend this apartment.

Really enjoyed staying at Hayens place was exactly what we needed just a relax and a nice view. Place is very quiet and a very short walk to a beach where we were completely alone and it was fantastic.
Hayen is very responsive to your needs always very pleasant to talk to.
Thankyou for having us!

Great location and very helpful and accommodating host.  There is a good full gym in the building for an extra fee and host can help you to get a scooter, which I would suggest for exploring the area.
I would highly recommend staying Huyéns place. it was quiet and extremely comfortable in a great location. we thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Thank you
Die Unterkunft war toll und der Blick vom Balkon atemberaubend 😊
친절한
This was our second stay here and its a wonderful spot.
Great host!
god service

Căn hộ vô cùng rộng rãi , có một ban công nhỏ để bạn phơi đồ mà trong ảnh không chụp, không gian rất thoải mái.
Chăn ga gối đệm sạch sẽ, bồng bềnh, rất tuyệt vời.
Đồ dùng đầy đủ , chúng tôi có thể thưởng thức 1 tách cà phê thơm tự làm tại đây, host đã chuẩn bị sẵn 1 máy pha cà phê.
Lần tới quay lại Quảng Ninh, nhất định sẽ ghé lại.

A La Carte nói chung mới và hiện đại. Phòng là căn góc hướng ra biển và đảo Tuần Châu, phía dưới là nhìn khu cắm trại và bãi biển đẹp mắt. Trong phòng gọn gàng, sạch sẽ và rộng hơn trong ảnh. Có bếp, dụng cụ nấu, máy giặt. Nhìn chung nếu lần sau tới Hạ Long mình sẽ đặt lại phòng này
Phòng view rộng ok nha mng, có trục trặc gọi là mấy anh điều ng lên ngay. Cảm thấy ok rat nhìu ạ . Cam on anh vi cho em out muộn, siu biết ơnn ạaa neu co dịp sẽ qlai thuê ạ:3

Tôi đã có trải nghiệm tuyệt vời tại căn hộ của Hà Vân. Cô ấy rất nhiệt tình hướng dẫn tôi đến những điểm tham quan. Đây là một nơi có cảnh đẹp tuyệt vời. Căn hộ xinh đẹp hệt như trong ảnh. Thời gian lý tưởng nhất để chụp ảnh đẹp là vào buổi chiều khi ánh nắng chiếu xuống mặt biển lấp lánh, tôi có thể ngồi cả buổi để ngắm khủng cảnh ấy từ trong phòng. Căn phòng sạch sẽ vất rất mới.
Chủ nhà hỗ trợ nhiệt tình trong suốt chuyến đi. Phòng y hệt trên ảnh nha mỗi cái là vị trí toà này đi lại các khu vui chơi trung tâm hơi xa chút

we booked the airbnb for 3 nights, it was great as the view is absolutely beautifull. the building has a lot of services which is nice!
The room was not the cleanest however, the trash been was full when we arrived and the cupboards were full of stuff.
A part from this, the owner was really reactive and helpful. The place is beautiful so I would recomend it!

Một căn hộ đẹp, tầm nhìn ra vịnh cực kỳ đẹp và bình yên, không khí trong lành, con người ở khu vực rất nhiệt tình và dễ mến. Tôi đã có trải nghiệm tuyệt vời tại căn hộ này. Nhất định sẽ quay lại lần sau

Không gian xinh đẹp để checkin và nghỉ dưỡng cặp đôi cũng như gia đình nhỏ. Phòng ốc mới tinh, sạch thơm, chủ nhà nhiệt tình, thân thiện, chu đáo. Đặc biệt căn này view biển đẹp nhất trong vị trí các căn trong toà nhà. Lần tới nhất định sẽ quay lại trong kỳ nghỉ dài hơn.

Hi chị chủ Samset home, quả thực lần đầu tiên book phòng trên airbnb mà ngạc nhiên về chất lượng phòng cũng như chủ nhà. Căn em book của nhà chị có view 10 điểm không có nhưng, kiểu view biển panorama, đồ nội thất xinh xắn, decor vibe biển rất hợp gu của em. Ưng thêm cả việc chủ căn take care rất cẩn thận khách, reply tin nhắn nhanh chóng và hướng dẫn đi lại rất nhiệt tình. Chắc chắn em sẽ quay lại và giới thiệu thêm cho bạn bè để có nơi healing tuyệt vời ❤️
Phòng căn góc có cửa sổ lớn và view nhìn thẳng ra biển rất đẹp. Phòng rộng rãi và đầy đủ tiện nghi, đồ dùng. An ninh và cơ sở vật chất của toà rất tốt. Chị Vân rất chu đáo và nhiệt tình hỗ trợ.
Phòng ốc sạch sẽ, tiện nghi. Host nhiệt tình hỗ trợ khách khi quên đồ

I had a wonderful stay at this modern and spotless apartment. The sea view was absolutely stunning, and the location made it the perfect place to relax. The host was incredibly friendly and helpful, even assisting us with luggage after check-out. It was a truly memorable experience, and I’ll definitely come back in the future!

This is one of the airbnb that I love so much. Without any complaint I can give. Everything is perfect and I wish to stay one more night if can. Next time surely will back again. The four season pool is nice just need to pay extra, but it’s good option for me esp with baby . Can relax there due the weather changed cold we don’t go on cruise but jacuzzi . I love this unit so much!

We were only staying for one night before heading to Ha Long for a cruise so it was the perfect place to relax and get some washing done. The washer/dryer worked perfectly and we had a lovely view of the bay.
We went for a walk in the area but noticed there wasn’t a whole lot to do or many people around - a lot of nearby buildings turned out to be vacant, which explains why.
The apartment has a smart tv however the only app that can be used on it (as confirmed with the host whilst there) is YouTube.
Overall, it was the perfect place to stay for one night being so close (13 minutes) from where the cruises at Ha Long Bay take off from :)

An experience i will never forget. From the moment i arrived i was welcomed by host Hieu who made himself available assisting me in my planning the 2 days in Halong Bay.
The room is exceptional . The hotel has magnificent infinity pool with views beyond belief.
Vietnam continues to amaze me

This is a great spot if you’re looking for a place to stay in Ha Long. It’s a multi purpose building with shops and great buffet in the lobby for breakfast, convenient transportation options nearby. New place and modern.
Apartment was super clean, amazing view over the water and for sunset. Short taxi journey to bars and restaurants. Would highly recommend, one of the best Airbnb’s I’ve had in Vietnam.

The area is beautiful, and the hotel where the Airbnb is located offers plenty of amenities. However, most of them are overpriced, and the food at the hotel restaurant didn’t live up to the cost. While it’s clear they’re trying to make the area more upscale, just a 10–15 minute walk away it becomes noticeably run down, with abandoned shops. It was difficult to find nearby spots to eat or grab a drink, so we often had to call a Grab taxi to get around. That said, the view from the air bnb was absolutely stunning! The 2 in 1 washer and dryer was nice to have too!

Ha Van was amazing from start to finish. It was out of season so there wasn’t a huge amount to do.
She had Hieu come in everyday and we felt very well looked after. He answered all of our questions and helped us find places to go and even found the tea we like. Amazing service! Thank you both of you
Thank you
Tôi đã có một chuyến đi tuyệt vời. Căn phòng rất đẹp, đầy đủ đồ dùng. Mọi thứ hệt như trong ảnh, đúng kỳ vọng của tôi. Lần sau nhất định tôi sẽ đến đây cùng gia đình tôi
Một căn hộ tuyệt vời cho kì nghỉ cuối tuần. View biển tuyệt đẹp. Ngay dưới toà nhà là biển, rất thuận tiện. Cô chủ đáng yêu, nhiệt tình vô cùng.
Phòng rất xinh view biển chiều ngắm hoàng hôn chill chill. Chủ nhà nhiệt tình 🫶
We had the best stay here , we wished it was longer as the hotel was awesome. Halong bay lived up to expectations and I would recommend as a bucket list destination!
L'appartement est tout à fait conforme. La vue est spectaculaire. L'hôte est très réactive. 👌

De kamer ziet eruit als op de fotos en heeft een mooi uitzicht. Wij hadden meerdere problemen met het internet, de televisie en warm water. De host reageerde snel en wilde altijd helpen. Dit ging alleen niet zo snel als wij gehoopt hadden.
Voor ons was de grootste teleurstelling de omgeving. Het is vrij afgelegen en wordt helemaal ingericht voor tourisme. Er zijn geen normale supermarkten in de buurt en ook weinig eetgelegenheden. De prijzen zijn allemaal veel hoger dan de rest van Vietnam en de kwaliteit naar onze mening veel lager. Verder is er weinig te doen en ben je erg afhankelijk van taxi's.
Ook schrokken we van de kosten van het zwembad en de sportschool. Zwemmen kost per keer meer dan 7 euro voor twee mensen en je kaartje is geldig voor of het binnenzwembad of het buitenzwembad. Als je beide wilt gebruiken of later op de dag terug wilt komen, moet je een nieuw kaartje kopen. Het zelfde geldt voor de sportschool.
Really great place to stay. Fit the photos and very clear apartment. Highly recommend.

Homestay giá hợp lý, vị trí trung tâm di chuyển cả qua Bãi Cháy và Hòn Gai đều rất tiện. Quan trọng là view siêu đáng tiền. Host cũng rất chu đáo. Bên trong homestay cũng đầy đủ đồ đạc, sạch sẽ, tiện nghi. Sau có dịp quay lại Hạ Long mình chắc chắn sẽ book tiếp.
Lần quay lại thứ 2 trong năm. Mọi phòng đểu có view nhin thẳng ra biển, tầng 29 nên thấy được toàn cảnh Hạ Long, sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi như ở nhà. RCM nên book tại đây
Chỗ ở tốt thuận tiện cho việc di chuyển, căn hộ có đầy đủ thiết bị cơ bản. Đặc biệt có view pháo hoa rất đẹp và chủ nhà nhiệt tình. Sẽ quay trở lại khi có dịp

I would highly recommend this unit for an overnight (or longer) stay in Ha Long Bay. It's spacious and beautiful inside, and in a great location for touring the city. Kane is a very friendly and helpful host, he quickly greeted us to help us check in once we arrived. Overall, we were very satisfied with our experience!
Chỗ ở có tầm nhìn tuyệt vời, anh host rất chu đáo và nhiệt tình. Anh có giúp mình set up phòng nhân dịp đặc biệt của mình. Cảm ơn anh rất nhiều.
tôi rất hài lòng về chỗ ở có vị trí tầm nhìn rất đẹp mà giá cả rất dễ chịu. Nếu có dịp tôi sẽ quay lại lần nữa.
Đẹp, ở tầng áp chót của tòa,  mọi phòng ngủ view trực diện nhìn ra biển, phòng sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi, cảm giác như ở nhà.

Chủ nhà vô cùng thân thiện và hiếu khách! Anh chủ không chỉ hướng dẫn tận tình về địa điểm du lịch mà còn giới thiệu những quán ăn ngon trong khu vực. Mọi thứ trong căn hộ đều được chuẩn bị cẩn thận, mang lại cảm giác như ở nhà. Một trải nghiệm đáng nhớ!

Thank you so much for the amazing service and quick communication. We could check in flexibly and the host was very nice. He reacted quickly and even provided us restaurant and bike rental recommendations. We had a nice stay and would love to come back next time.

Great stay at Ha Long Bay! Amazing view from the suite which is practically at the top of the building! Kane was super responsive as a host and very flexible and helpful! Recommend to stay if in Ha Long Bay and want a quieter area to relax
Home xinh xắn, a chủ thân thiện nhiệt tình

Really nice apartment. Located in one of the two sapphire buildings close to the top floor with a really nice view. A little bit confusing to find the right building, but otherwise, it was super nice. Definitely would recommend especially for the value.
We had a fantastic stay, Kane was very flexible with the check in and let us store our bags at the flat when we arrived earlier than planned. Everything was super clean and comfortable :))
Giá quá rẻ so với chất lượng, phòng ốc sạch sẽ, view biển siêu đẹp. Anh chủ nhà rất thân thiện. Sẽ quay lại nếu có dịp.
Nhà view siêu đẹp rộng rãi thoải mái. Mk k kì vọng nhiều khi xem ảnh nhưng thực tế thì siêu hài lòng, phù hợp gia đình tụ tập thoải mái như ở nhà

Logement réservé en arrêt avant notre croisière sur la baie d’ halong. Effectivement à proximité pour rejoindre lieu d’embarcation en grabs  . Peu de restaurants à proximité , logement propre et hôte réactif
Tuyệt vời
Phòng sạch sẽ , view đẹp

One of the best places I have stayed in Vietnam. Incredible view, amazingly helpful hosts who responded in real time for everything I asked. I could not have asked for more and highly recommend, gave local recommendations and helped organise transport. If I could give more than 5 stars I would. Thank you for making our visit to Ha Long incredible.
great location, excellent view and very helpful host. highly recommended

L’hôte était très gentil et nous a même accommodé pour laisser nos valises après le Check out. L’appartement était très joli, situé au dernier étage avec une vue superbe sur l’eau. Le quartier était très tranquille et à quelques minutes de taxi des tours de bateau.
Great place, spacious and clean with great view of halong bay from above. Highly recommended to anyone.
Great apartment overlooking the bay. Great views from the 29th floor. Kane was amazing and really helped with anything we needed in Halong Bay
The host was super responsive at late notice and provided plenty of local recommendations and taxis. The Airbnb was very clean and the beds are very comfortable!
View đẹp, chủ nhà rất nhiệt tình

De passage pendant quelques jours, nous avons pu profiter de ce superbe airbnb.
Tout est propre, conforme à la description et sentait bon. Je recommande fortement!
Pour les personnes qui ont l’habitude de tout faire a pied, les restaurants sont un peu loin mais ici tout se fait en grab/scooter.
Aussi, très belle réactivité de la part de notre hôte. Merci beaucoup!

This apartment is close to the beach, very spacious and clean.
The host was responsive and helpful, I will recommend this place for sure.
ok lắm
Really nice place to stay.  Very clean and comfortable.  It was a little difficult finding the place as the address does not show up on a map.  Host was very accommodating.
Dịch vụ rất tốt

The apartment was gorgeous. Spacious and clean, with extra blankets, pillows etc. We added an additional 2 nights to our stay. Host was very response and helpful when we accidentally locked ourselves out (oops), sorted this within a minute or so!
They were also happy to extend our check out by an hour or so if needed. Local area has lots of nice cafes etc.
The reception staff told us that they don’t do laundry and the gym was no longer open, which were both reasons why we booked so slightly inconvenient however this is no reflection on the host, maybe the building has changed its amenities.
Overall would definitely stay again, thank you ☺️☺️🫶🏻
Nothing to complain about - great stay!
I stayed for a week. The owner upgraded me to ocean view unit. The view was breathtaking. The owner was responsive and helpful.
Was a perfect stay for my family they had a lovely time and got upgraded to a ocean view thank you so much!
Lovely apartment
洗手液是坏的
Parfait
Great value and close to restaurants.
Super logement ! Par contre, petit détail, la piscine est payante
Great place! Def recommend!
Viskas super
Excellent rapport qualité-prix et l'hôte est très réactive et amicale ! Je recommande vivement
Comfortable bed,clean and  good area...

Logement très fonctionnel très propre.
Bien équipé pour séjourner de manière totalement indépendante. Je recommande.
非常好。房间很干净 揍几步路就是海边
其实本来房子也不错，就是晒的很热，进去必须赶快开空调，但是房主的姐姐给我和我孩子每人收取30万越南盾，用车船连票得方式送到吉婆岛酒店，我当面让她姐姐看着订的酒店，并且问了房主是不是可以信任，房主说没问题，结果没送到，我们还是自己打车到的酒店，中途退了我们每人10万，其实车船连票只需要每人13万越南盾而且接送到自己得酒店，车索道连票10万不包送到地方，卖家不仅多收钱，还让我来回打车费了很多事

We had an overall great stay that covered everything we needed with an outstanding host who spoke english really well and helped us with a lot information and booking activities. The only downside is that we felt the food at the restaurant was just OK and not really as described nor worth what we paid for. We really love vietnamese food and would have loved to eat it in a more traditional way both for breaksfast and dinner. At other places we also haven’t had to pay for water but I do understand if this is necessary.
Would recommend still and it
has good facilities for working on your laptop if you need to.

Incredible Stay at Almor Homestay – Beyond Expectations!
Our experience at Almor Homestay was absolutely amazing! The family was incredibly friendly, always there to help or have a nice chat, making us feel right at home. What truly touched us was their kindness and support when we both struggled with food poisoning—they went above and beyond to take care of us, and we’re so grateful for that.
Extending our stay was effortless, and they didn’t even charge us extra for it. Renting a motorbike through them was super convenient, and having the option to enjoy delicious food pretty much around the clock was a huge bonus. Need a transfer to another location, like Hanoi? No problem—everything was arranged smoothly without any hassle.
Check-in and check-out were seamless, and the warmth and hospitality made this one of the best homestay experiences we’ve ever had. We would highly recommend Almor Homestay to anyone looking for a comfortable, welcoming, and truly special place to stay!
Had an amazing stay. Great price and lovely host. They organised our day trip around the bay by boat which was amazing
